text: Is a widespread NN outbreak inside DT NNP NNPS inevitable ? After weeks of generally optimistic statements , officials are now warning PRP to prepare for DT worst . Over DT past several days PRP have seen DT number of confirmed NNS outside of NNP escalate dramatically , and this has really rattled JJ financial markets . After being down more than 1,000 points on Monday , DT Dow Jones Industrial Average fell another 879 points on Tuesday . U.S. stocks have lost more then 1.7 trillion dollars in value in just two days . Much more importantly , a wave of tremendous panic is starting to sweep across America , and PRP looks IN this crisis is just getting started . Usually officials at DT CDC choose their words very carefully so IN PRP do not needlessly alarm DT NN . With DT in mind , I MD VB for PRP to consider three statements WDT DT CDC’s Dr. Nancy Messonnier made about a potential outbreak inside DT NNP NNPS during a press conference on Tuesday … # 1 “ PRP ’s not so much of a question of if this will happen in this country anymore but a question of when this will happen . ” # 2 “ Disruption to everyday life MD be severe . ” # 3 “ PRP are asking DT American NN to prepare for DT expectation IN this might be bad . ” Can PRP ever recall a top CDC official ever making statements this ominous ? In addition , Messonnier warned IN PRP MD soon become necessary for schools and businesses to greatly restrict person to person contact … DT CDC outlined what schools and businesses will likely need to do if DT NN - CD NN becomes an epidemic outbreak in DT U.S. Schools should consider dividing students into smaller groups or close and use “ internet - based tele - schooling , ” Dr. Nancy Messonnier , director of DT CDC ’s National Center for Immunization and Respiratory Diseases , told reporters on a conference call . “ For adults , businesses can replace in - person meetings with video or telephone conferences and increase teleworking options , ” Messonnier VBD . On a temporary basis such measures MD not be too disruptive , but what if this NN just keeps spreading month after month ? PRP are potentially facing a scenario WDT is truly unprecedented , and PRP is becoming increasingly clear IN officials have lost confidence IN PRP will be able to contain this NN . In fact , CD former U.S. official told USA Today IN “ DT horse is out of DT barn ” … Dennis Carroll , former director of DT U.S. Agency for International Development ’s NNP NNP Security and Development Unit , credited NNP ’s “ extraordinary control measures ” with delaying DT spread of DT NN . But he VBD avoiding a pandemic is “ very unlikely . ” “ DT dramatic uptick of NNS in South Korea , Iran and Italy are reflective of a self - sustaining spreading of DT NN , ” Carroll , who now leads DT NNP Virome Project NN cooperative , told USA TODAY . “ And a clear message IN DT horse is out of DT barn . ” At this point EX are still only a few dozen confirmed NNS in DT NNP NNPS , but authorities are bracing for DT worst . If PRP can believe PRP , San Francisco Mayor London Breed just declared a NN of emergency because of this NN … Mayor London Breed declared a local emergency in San Francisco Tuesday amid DT NN outbreak , despite EX being no confirmed NNS among DT city ’s residents . “ Although EX are still zero confirmed NNS in San Francisco residents , DT JJ picture is changing rapidly , and PRP need to step - up preparedness , ” Breed VBD in a statement . “ PRP see DT NN spreading in JJ parts of DT NN every day , and PRP are taking DT necessary steps to protect San Franciscans from harm . ” And after being quite apathetic about this outbreak at first , NNS all over America are suddenly realizing IN PRP should be preparing for a potential pandemic . In fact , Silicon Valley investor Geoff Lewis created quite a stir when he asked for advice on stockpiling food . DT following is DT question WDT he posted on Twitter WDT caused so much of an uproar … If CD were hypothetically stockpiling four months of shelf stable food , what MD folks recommend ( optimizing for keto friendly ) ? PRP have n’t seen anything IN this in DT NNP NNPS in a very long NN . But PRP have n’t even had a single death from this NN in our country yet . How crazed will NNS VB when victims start dropping dead in DT streets IN PRP have been in Wuhan ? EX is now talk IN DT IOC MD potentially cancel or postpone DT Olympic Games in Tokyo . At CD NN such talk MD have seemed crazy , but this is how serious this outbreak has become . In Iran , DT number of confirmed NNS has now jumped to 95 , although JJ NNS believe IN DT true number is far , far higher . During a press conference on Monday , Iran ’s deputy NN minister attempted to downplay DT seriousness of this outbreak , but on Tuesday PRP learned IN he has been infected too … Iran ’s deputy NN minister VBD he has tested positive for DT novel NN and is in self - quarantine at his home just a day after he appeared at a NN conference in Tehran where he sought to quell fears about DT outbreak . Iraj Harirchi , DT head of Iran ’s counter - NN task force , announced DT illness in a video online while vowing IN authorities MD continue working to control DT spread . Apparently not wanting to be outdone , CD of DT officials in South Korea WDT was overseeing DT response to this outbreak decided to jump off a bridge … But in Seoul took on a more morbid tone Tuesday following reports in DT local press IN a civil servant from DT Ministry of Justice ’s Emergency Safety Planning Office jumped off a bridge in Seoul at around 5 am local NN Tuesday . DT official was CD of several individuals charged with overseeing DT NN ’s response to DT NN . As NNS soar and hysteria mounts , PRP suspect this NN wo n’t exactly help quiet DT NN ’s nerves . Suicide is never DT answer to anything , and PRP should all be praying for DT man ’s family . In Italy , DT number of confirmed NNS has grown by more than 15 times since Friday … Over in Italy , DT number of confirmed NNS has surpassed 300 to 322 , while DT number of dead climbed to 10 , according to Italian emergency chief Angelo Borrelli , who VBD DT newly deceased were over DT age of 80 . DT ’s up from just 20 confirmed NNS on Friday . Newly deceased were over 80 NNS old , says at press conference in Rome Tuesday . DT JJ infections include three NNS in southern Sicily region , Italian Civil Protection official Borrelli VBD . All of a sudden , NNS all over Europe are wanting to avoid Italians because of DT potential of catching DT NN . In most NNS DT fear is irrational , but PRP do VB IN an Italian just spread DT NN to a hotel in Spain ’s Canary Islands … Hundreds of staff and tourists staying at a hotel in Spain ’s Canary Islands were put under lockdown on Tuesday , El Pais newspaper reported . CD person who had stayed at DT establishment was later found to have tested positive for DT NN . I lived in Italy for a few NNS as a child , and I have a great love for DT country . PRP is so sad to watch what is happening over RB , but DT same things are VBG to start happening here . In fact , Dr. Messonnier has told DT NN IN now is DT NN “ to begin preparing ” for a massive outbreak … “ NNS are concerned about this situation – I MD say rightfully so , ” Messonnier VBD . “ But PRP are putting our concerns to work preparing . Now is DT NN for businesses , hospitals , communities , schools and everyday NNS to begin preparing as well . ” If PRP do prepare and all of this turns out to be a false alarm , at least PRP will be ready for DT next crisis WDT is coming . But if PRP do n’t do anything to prepare and things VBP really , really bad , PRP MD end up costing PRP dearly . If this NN starts spreading across DT NNP NNPS IN wildfire , PRP and your family will VB to minimize contact with DT NN as much as possible . So stock up on DT things PRP will need now , because when things start getting really crazy DT stores will be cleaned out very quickly . NN spreads to Germany , Switzerland , Croatia , Iraq , Spain , Algeria , Austria and Brazil while NNS explode in Italy by 45 % in CD day Over DT last 36 hours or so , DT NN spread has now been confirmed in a slew of JJ NNS , including Germany , Switzerland , Croatia , Iraq , Spain , Algeria and Austria . A second confirmation test is necessary to make DT diagnosis “ official . ” These are irrefutable facts , yet PRP still have naysayers throughout DT NN and across DT cultural landscape who claim none of this is happening , IN DT NN bioweapon system is “ just another NN , ” or IN PRP ’s a grand hoax being perpetrated by all these NNS as some elaborate staged event to commit JJ suicide for some unknown reason . Rush Limbaugh , meanwhile , still insists DT NN is just “ DT NN . ” PRP ’s a reminder why highly influential NNS should stick to their areas of expertise and not wander into areas where PRP very quickly demonstrate their shocking technical ignorance and lack of knowledge . NN infections exploded overnight in Italy , rising to 322 confirmed NNS , an increase of 100 from DT previous day . To try to stop DT spread of DT NN , Italy is running armed road blocks surrounding 12 towns , prohibiting road travel . According to DT Epoch Times , no NN in Italy even knows DT source of DT outbreak , completely obliterating any argument from WHO officials IN this is “ contained ” or “ not a pandemic . ” Via TET : Italian NN officials have n’t yet identified DT source of DT outbreak . Angelo Borrelli , DT head of DT Italian civil protection department , VBD DT case count grew from 222 to 322 , representing a 45 % increase , in a 24 - hour period from Monday evening to Tuesday evening . According to DT pandemic denialists , of course , Italy must be faking PRP for some reason . Yes , PRP ’s an insane idea , but DT ’s what is now being promoted by DT left - wing NN and even some conservative journalists . Notably , DT very bureaucrat in Iran who told everybody DT NN was no big deal is now infected himself . RB via TET : Only a day earlier , a coughing and heavily sweating Iraj Harirchi VBD at a televised NN conference in Tehran IN “ DT situation is almost stable in DT country . ” NNP Ministry spokesman Kianoush Jahanpour confirmed Harirchi had DT NN . Harirchi himself posted an online video saying he had PRP and IN he had quarantined himself at home . He promised IN authorities MD bring DT NN under control . DT ’s reassuring , huh ? DT very NN bureaucrat sitting in quarantine after accidentally getting infected is telling PRP all DT NN has PRP under control . DT irony is almost pure comedy , if PRP were n’t so tragic . San Franciso declares NN of emergency while NN tells PRP EX ’s no emergency at all San Francisco , meanwhile , has just declared a NN of emergency over DT NN , even when CDC officials claim EX are essentially zero confirmed NNS in San Francisco . According to DT SF Chronicle , Mayor London Breed VBD more resources need to be allocated , “ to make sure PRP are prepared , ” even while DT entire NN establishment in America claims EX ’s nothing to be prepared for in DT first place . So why did San Fran just declare an emergency , then ? DT CDC ’s insane policy of “ Do n’t Test , Do n’t Tell ” is keeping America in DT dark while DT epidemic explodes across U.S. cities .

text: Mining towns draw monikers from PRP . Political leaders keep close tabs on PRP . Others flat out disparage PRP . Indeed , uranium owns its share of controversy . For NNS , DT element has been tied to talk of nuclear weapons and DT birth of DT atomic age . Today , however , DT metal has taken on a different role -- in DT form of NN . In fact , much of DT enriched uranium stored in nuclear weapons from DT arms race has been rededicated to fueling DT NN 's nuclear power reactors , which provided DT NN with almost 14 percent of its electricity in 2010 [ source : Nuclear NNP Institute ] . And PRP 's extremely powerful , too . CD 7 - gram pellet of uranium fuel produces as much NN as 3.5 barrels of oil and 807 kilograms ( 1,779 pounds ) of coal [ source : Newfoundland Labrador DNR ] . Beyond lighting up homes and businesses through nuclear power , uranium makes radioisotopes WDT produce radiation , which can help diagnose and treat certain JJ conditions . PRP 's RB used for shielding and , in its depleted form , as counterweights for aircraft , too . But where does uranium come from and how is PRP gathered ? IN other metals , uranium occurs naturally in rocks on DT NNP 's surface and can be extracted through uranium mining . Miners originally discovered uranium alongside radium , another element WDT was used as glowing , decorative paint ( at least until NNS realized its harmful , radioactive effects ) . Uranium hit DT market as a decorative glaze before its nuclear properties were discovered . This heavy metal comes in several isotopes , or forms of DT element with different numbers of neutrons . Depending on DT stability of an isotope , some can be more radioactive ( likely to give off energetic particles ) and fissile ( likely to produce nuclear fission ) than others . Uranium - 238 measures as DT most abundant isotope of DT element on NNP and can be found in rocks and seawater . But PRP 's not as radioactive as uranium - 235 , DT best - known form of uranium used to create nuclear reactions . In this article , PRP 'll chart DT uranium mining process , tracking DT element as PRP transitions from ore to fuel pellets ready to be used by nuclear reactors . PRP 'll RB look at DT wax and wane of uranium mining , as well as DT risks for humans and DT environment by following DT contentious debate over mining uranium in DT backyard of DT U.S. 's most iconic canyon . Dust off your doomsday clock as PRP revisit DT origins of uranium mining and all things nuclear on DT next page .

text: As investigators search for DT man who PRP say set a small fire last week at D.C. - area pizza shop , Comet Ping Pong , followers of DT debunked " pizzagate " NN theory have been speculating about what was " really " behind DT blaze . " To destroy evidence or vengeance ? I hope DT latter , " a user wrote on DT JJ Facebook group " PizzagateUncompromised , " CD of hundreds of comments in dozens of Facebook groups dedicated to DT NN theory . In CD group , users responded to NN IN Comet pizza was on fire with gifs of NNS eating popcorn . Others just celebrated . " Burn baby burn DT evil place of debauchery of NNS , torture and murder down , " CD user wrote . Pizzagate — which alleged IN Hillary NNP and prominent Democrats ran a child sex and sacrifice ring out of DT pizzeria 's basement — has mostly waned since its nadir in December 2016 , when a North Carolina man on a mission to rescue imaginary NNS fired several shots from an assault - style rifle inside DT restaurant . Eclipsed by a related NN theory , Qanon , pizzagate has decreased in popularity in part due to crackdowns by online platforms . Reddit banned DT pizzagate groups in 2016 and YouTube recently announced a commitment to stop recommending NN videos . But PRP still have a home on Facebook . In over 30 different open and closed Facebook groups , boasting more than 40,000 collective members , pizzagate followers have kept DT NN alive . In DT face of reason , these pizzagate adherents have held tightly to " evidence " — mostly what PRP allege is coded language and symbols WDT link shapes to pedophelia and food products IN cheese and pasta to NNS . DT members post misinformation and wild allegations linking just about anyone to a NN - wide pedopehila ring . Their targets have included everyone and everything from local businesses to Tom Hanks to a random Facebook user wearing a t - shirt with DT image of a slice of pizza on PRP . This week , a major topic of conversation has been Celine Dion 's weight loss , which group members falsely attributed to an addiction to Adrenochrome , a real chemical compound WDT pizzagate conspiracists claim is " harvested " from tortured NNS , and taken by DT political and Hollywood elite to VB high . None of this is borne out by any evidence to be true in any way . In 2018 , Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced DT platform was refocusing DT Newsfeed so IN users MD see less content from NN and brands and more from their friends , family and groups . For DT majority of Facebook users , DT meant more posts from local parent collectives , spread out family groups , or RB - minded hobbyists . For DT more conspiratorial user , PRP can amount to a curated cult . PRP 's not merely DT existence of pizzagate - IN NN groups , but DT mechanisms by which Facebook serves them up , WDT can radicalize users , VBD Renée DiResta , a researcher of disinformation online and director of research at NNP Knowledge . Joining a Facebook group tells Facebook to suggest other groups and pages related to DT topic . " If PRP VBP something , PRP will show PRP more of DT , " DiResta VBD . " So belonging to gardening groups will make Facebook suggest to PRP more gardening groups . " Facebook 's suggestion algorithm RB infers commonalities between users and other members of groups WDT user joins . " In a healthy way , this MD mean Facebook is saying ' If PRP VBP gardening , maybe PRP RB VBP cooking , ' " DiResta VBD . " In DT case of NN content , Facebook 's recommendation engine says , ' If PRP VBP pseudoscience , I 'll show PRP chemtrails and flat NN . ' " " Because of DT increase of ominous conspiracies , PRP 're seeing groups around these NN theories IN QAnon or pizzagate being referred to NNS who MD never search for them in DT first place . " As an example , for users who find their way into a pizzagate interest group named after Hillary NNP 's campaign chairman , John Podesta — whose stolen emails are misread in a way to inform much of DT Pizzagate NN — a right rail labeled " Suggested Groups " includes DT group " Pizzagate Reports , " DT header image for which is prominent Democrats including Hillary NNP and Barack Obama and George Soros , photoshopped with glowing red eyes in what appears to be a Satanic ritual . Similarly , users visiting DT private group " Pizzagate , " topped with an image WDT points to Comet 's owner James Alefantis as DT ringleader of a child sacrifice ring — are pushed to join other fringe groups including , " Real UFO Sightings & Strange Phenomenon , " " Official Flat NNP & Globe Discussion , " and " Q Angels , " a group dedicated to an unfounded NN theory involving Donald NNP and a secret war against a cabal of alleged child abusers . Facebook did not respond to a request for comment . In a July interview with Recode editor Kara Swisher , CEO Mark Zuckerberg defended DT practice of letting NN groups remain , but acknowledged Facebook 's responsibility to take down misinformation WDT MD induce violence . Alefantis told DT Washington Post IN DT shop still regularly gets harassing phone calls , a practice discussed in several of DT pizzagate Facebook Groups . " At first [ DT manager ] VBD I was making him physically shake and now he just listens to me until he finally hangs up . He never really answers or addresses my concerns . But I still call . Once a day , every day , " CD woman wrote last NN under a post about her efforts to call Comet regularly . " Love PRP !! Lol VB em , " another user responded .

text: Speakers recently flew in from around ( or perhaps , across ? ) DT NNP for a three - day event held in Birmingham : DT UK ’s first ever JJ flat NNP convention . PRP was well attended , and was n’t just three days of speeches and YouTube clips ( though , granted , EX was a lot of this ) . EX was RB a lot of team - building , networking , debating , workshops – and scientific experiments . Yes , flat earthers do seem to place a lot of emphasis and priority on scientific methods and , in particular , on observable facts . DT weekend , in no small part , revolved around discussing and debating NN , with lots of NN spent running , planning , and reporting on DT latest set of flat NNP experiments and models . Indeed , as CD presenter noted early on , flat earthers try to “ look for multiple , verifiable evidence ” and advised attendees to “ always do your own research and accept PRP might be wrong ” . While flat earthers seem to trust and support scientific methods , what PRP do n’t trust is NNS , and DT established relationships between “ power ” and “ knowledge ” . This relationship between power and knowledge has long been theorised by sociologists . By exploring this relationship , PRP can begin to understand why EX is a swelling resurgence of flat earthers . Let me begin by stating quickly IN I ’m not really interested in discussing if DT NNP is flat or not ( for DT record , I ’m happily a “ globe earther ” ) – and I ’m not seeking to mock or denigrate this community . What ’s important here is not necessarily whether PRP believe DT NNP is flat or not , but instead what their resurgence and JJ conventions , such as DT NN in Birmingham , tell PRP about NN and knowledge in DT 21st century . Multiple competing models were suggested throughout DT weekend , including “ classic ” flat NN , domes , NN walls , diamonds , puddles with multiple worlds inside , and even DT NNP as DT inside of a giant cosmic egg . DT level of discussion however often did not revolve around DT models on offer , but on broader issues of attitudes towards existing structures of knowledge , and DT institutions WDT supported and presented these models . Flat earthers are not DT first group to be sceptical of existing power structures and their tight grasps on knowledge . This viewpoint is somewhat typified by DT work of Michel Foucault , a famous and heavily influential 20th century philosopher who made a career of studying those on DT fringes of society to understand what PRP MD tell PRP about everyday life . He is well known , among JJ other things , for looking at DT close relationship between power and knowledge . He suggested IN knowledge is created and used in a way WDT reinforces DT claims to legitimacy of those in power . At DT same NN , those in power control what is considered to be correct and incorrect knowledge . According to Foucault , EX is therefore an intimate and interlinked relationship between power and knowledge . At DT NN Foucault was writing on DT topic , DT control of power and knowledge had moved away from religious institutions , which previously had a very singular hold over knowledge and morality , and was instead beginning to move towards a network of scientific institutions , NN monopolies , legal courts , and bureaucratised governments . Foucault argued IN these institutions work to maintain their claims to legitimacy by controlling knowledge . In DT 21st century , PRP are witnessing another important shift in both power and knowledge due to factors WDT include DT increased availability of JJ platforms afforded by social NN . Knowledge is no longer centrally controlled and – as has been pointed out in DT wake of Brexit – DT age of DT expert MD be passing . Now , everybody has DT power to create and share content . When Michael Gove , a leading proponent of Brexit , proclaimed : “ I VBP DT NNS of this country have had enough of experts ” , PRP MD seem IN he , in JJ ways , meant PRP . PRP is RB clear IN PRP ’re seeing increased polarisation in society , as PRP continue to drift away from agreed singular narratives and move into camps around shared interests . Recent PEW research suggests , for example , IN 80 per cent of voters who backed Hillary NNP in DT 2016 NNP presidential election – and 81 per cent of NNP voters – believe most supporters of DT two candidates are unable to agree on basic facts , let alone policies . Despite early claims , from as far back as HG Wells ’s NNP Brain essays in 1936 , IN a worldwide , shared resource of knowledge , such as DT internet , MD create peace , harmony and a common interpretation of reality , PRP appears IN quite DT opposite has happened . With DT increased voice afforded by social NN to a wide range of views , knowledge has been increasingly decentralised , and competing narratives have emerged . This was something of a recurring theme throughout DT weekend in Birmingham , and was especially apparent when four flat earthers debated three physics PhD students . A particular point of contention occurred when CD of DT physicists pleaded with DT audience to avoid trusting YouTube and bloggers . DT audience and DT panel of flat earthers took exception to this , noting IN “ now PRP ’ve got DT internet and mass communication … PRP ’re not reliant on what DT mainstream are telling PRP in newspapers , PRP can decide for ourselves ” . PRP was readily apparent IN DT flat earthers were keen to separate knowledge from scientific institutions . At DT same NN as scientific claims to knowledge and power are being undermined , some power structures are decoupling themselves from scientific knowledge , moving towards a kind of populist politics WDT is increasingly sceptical of knowledge . This has , in recent NNS , manifested itself in extreme ways – and can be seen in such examples as JJ figures showing support for Pizzagate or NNP ’s suggestions IN Ted Cruz ’s father shot JFK . But PRP can RB be seen in more subtle and insidious forms : in DT way in which Brexit , for example , was campaigned for in terms of gut feelings and emotions rather than expert statistics and predictions . NN is increasingly facing problems with its ability to communicate ideas publicly , a problem WDT flat earthers , and politicians , are able to circumvent with moves towards populism . Again , this theme occurred throughout DT weekend . Flat earthers were encouraged to trust “ poetry , freedom , passion , vividness , creativity , and yearning ” over DT more clinical regurgitation of established theories and facts . Attendees were told IN “ hope changes everything ” , and were warned against blindly trusting what PRP were told . This is a narrative echoed by some of DT celebrities who have used their power to back flat NNP beliefs , such as DT musician BOB , who tweeted : “ Do n’t believe what I say , research what I say . ” In JJ ways , a JJ meeting of flat earthers is a product and sign of our NN ; a reflection of our increasing distrust in scientific institutions , and DT moves by power - holding institutions towards populism and emotions . In much DT same way IN Foucault reflected on what social outcasts MD reveal about our social systems , EX is a lot IN flat earthers can reveal to PRP about DT current changing relationship between power and knowledge . And judging by DT success of this UK event – and DT large conventions planned in Canada and America this NN – PRP seems DT flat NNP is VBG to be around for a while yet . Harry T Dyer is a lecturer in education at DT university of East Anglia . This piece originally appeared on DT Conversation ( theconversation.com )

text: DT debate over genetically modified ( GM ) crops MD be stalled in DT European Union ’s Council of Ministers , but last week DT private sector appeared to deliver its own verdict on DT future of DT technology in Europe . BASF , a German chemical company , announced on 16 January IN PRP will end production of GM crops for DT European market and move its plant - NN headquarters from Limburgerhof in Germany to DT NNP NNPS . PRP will RB close other sites in Germany and Sweden , though PRP will maintain existing facilities in Belgium and Berlin . “ EX is still a lack of acceptance for this technology in JJ parts of Europe from DT majority of consumers , farmers and politicians , ” says Stefan Marcinowski , a member of BASF ’s board . “ PRP does not make business sense to continue investing in products exclusively for cultivation in this market . ” BASF will discontinue DT marketing of DT Amflora potato , CD of only two GM crops authorised for cultivation by DT European Commission . This will leave Monsanto ’s MON810 maize as DT only GM crop authorised for cultivation and marketed in DT EU . Environmental campaigners cheered DT move as a vindication of European consumers ’ rejection of DT technology . “ PRP ’s not often IN PRP share an analysis with BASF , but PRP ’re right IN EX ’s no demand , ” says Mute Schimpf , a food campaigner with Friends of DT NNP . But DT biotechnology sector warned IN Europe risks falling behind its JJ competitors because of “ scaremongering and misinformation ” about this emerging NN , which changes DT DNA of crops to make them more efficient . Werner Langen , a German centre - right MEP , says IN DT decision by BASF “ shows IN DT patchwork of national regulations made in this field has made Europe an unattractive location ” for GM research . While authorisations of GM crops have increased steadily in other parts of DT NN , particularly DT Americas , approval has been stalled in Europe for several NNS because of political opposition . Around 50 GM crops grown outside DT EU have been authorised for import , mostly used for industrial use or animal feed . Member NNS remain divided over DT issue of GM crops . A blocking minority of NNS – including Austria , Hungary , Poland and Greece – has refused to accept JJ authorisations for GM cultivation . This has irritated pro-GM NNS such as DT Netherlands , Spain , Sweden and DT UK , which are eager to deploy DT technology . DT Commission has been able to authorise only these two crops for cultivation , and some member NNS have imposed national bans . These bans were eventually found to be illegal under single market rules . Seeking a compromise , DT Commission proposed allowing member NNS to enact their own national bans , with DT implicit understanding IN in exchange PRP MD stop blocking JJ authorisations . But DT proposal has remained stalled because DT anti-GM NNS VBP to be able to ban DT crops on DT basis of environmental or NN concerns . DT Commission argues IN this is not possible , because food cannot be deemed safe in CD country but unsafe in another . Last week ’s announcement by BASF IN PRP is abandoning its production of GM crops in Europe because of a lack of acceptance “ from DT majority of consumers , farmers and politicians ” was an acknowledgement of a reality JJ biotechnology companies have been hesitant to countenance – Europe does not VB genetically modified crops . A 2010 Eurobarometer survey found IN 70 % of Europeans VBP IN GM food is “ fundamentally unnatural ” , and 59 % say IN such food is unsafe for their NN . A 2003 NN NN in DT NNP Kingdom found IN only 2 % of Britons MD be happy to eat GM foods . So - called frankenfood , as DT British tabloid press has dubbed them , have had a rough welcome in Europe . In December 2010 CD million signatures calling for a ban on GM crops were delivered to DT Commission as DT first ‘ citizens initiative ’ created by DT Lisbon treaty . But Europeans are virtually alone in this staunch resistance to GM crops . In north and south America , genetically modified crops have been introduced into DT food chain without anyone much noticing or caring . A 2006 NN by DT Pew Research Group showed IN Americans remain largely unaware of DT existence of GM crops , with only 40 % having heard of them and only 26 % believing PRP have eaten them . DT majority of Americans say PRP do not have concerns about GM crops . JJ perception has translated into JJ policy . DT EU ’s two approvals of GM crops for cultivation do not match DT more than 80 in DT NNP and 36 in Brazil . NNP and India are RB approving more GM crops , albeit more cautiously than in DT Americas . DT European Commission has tried to alleviate member NN concerns about DT crops by offering to let them opt out of EU authorisation , but DT issue is stuck in DT Council . Today 10 % of DT NN ’s arable land is growing GM crops . A report published by Friends of DT NNP last NN found IN less than 0.06 % of EU fields contain GM crops . Carel du Marchie Sarvaas of EuropaBio attributes DT better reception of GM crops in DT NNP NNPS to faster movement by DT industry . “ In DT NNP , DT technology was already RB when DT anti-GM movement came on NNS ’s radar , ” he says . “ In DT Americas EX ’s much greater faith in NN as a tool for progress , and DT food industry in DT Americas has been very supportive of NN . ” But according to Friends of DT NNP , DT increased focus in Europe is DT result of work by non-governmental organisations to bring DT issue to DT NN ’s attention . “ A lot of European consumers are concerned about DT open questions of NN with GM crops , ” she says . “ In north and south America PRP have no labelling system , and consumers are not aware of what ’s VBG on . ” “ PRP cannot ignore DT massive opposition in Europe , ” says Ladislav Miko , deputy director - general for DT food chain in DT Commission ’s NN department . “ This is why PRP believe DT issue needs more clarity and more JJ information . ” “ NNS need to be convinced EX are benefits for DT normal citizen , ” he adds . “ If PRP VBP DT benefit is just for farmers and companies , NNS wo n’t support DT . ” Environmental campaigners are urging DT anti-GM NNS to stand their ground , saying PRP is reasonable to have different NN concerns in different NNS . “ Europe is quite diverse , PRP have specific ecosystems in different member NNS , ” says Schimpf . She is unaware of any other products WDT have different environmental concerns in different NNS , but says GM crops are unlike other products of concern because PRP can multiply and PRP enter DT food chain . GM crops have been around for 15 NNS , and to date no adverse NN effects from approved strains have been documented anywhere in DT NN . European consumers are already eating meat from animals raised on GM feed imported into DT EU , and no adverse NN effects have been found . But environmental campaigners say not enough is yet known about DT NN effects , and more research is needed before PRP are embraced . “ DT EU needs to follow DT precautionary principle , ” says Schimpf . But advocates of GM crops say IN such hesitation is foolish when DT potential of DT technology to solve societal challenges is so large . “ PRP have a rapidly increasing population , PRP have to produce more food and PRP have to do PRP more sustainably , ” says Carel du Marchie Sarvaas , a director with EuropaBio , a pan-European biotechnology industry group . “ DT only way to do DT is to produce more from DT same amount of land . [ GM crops ] allow farmers to produce more yield per hectare . ” He adds IN more efficient crops mean less NN spent tilling DT land , translating to fewer CO2 NNS from farm equipment . In Spain , DT EU country WDT has embraced GM crops most enthusiastically , farmers have reported getting from 6 % to 30 % more yield by using Monsanto ’s MON810 maize . Between 2010 and 2011 , Spain saw a 27 % increase in DT acreage planted . Portugal , which started planting GM later , saw a 59 % increase during DT NN . Much has been made of DT potential of GM crops to combat famine in Africa , and Bill Gates has been CD of DT leading advocates of DT technology to help developing NNS ( see interview , Page 4 ) . text: This week , a particularly odd little bit of pseudoscience reared its head again when rapper B.o.B. took to Twitter and proclaimed IN DT NNP is flat . Since then , DT rapper has drawn DT ire of all sorts of incredulous NNS , including astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson . NNS have known IN DT NNP is round since at least DT sixth century B.C.E . So JJ were surprised to hear DT flat NNP concept still kicked around . But this was n't DT first resurgance of DT idea . Back in DT 1970s and ‘ 80s , a man named Charles Kenneth Johnson became a minor celebrity for his refusal to believe DT NNP is round , Cheryl Eddy writes for iO9 . Johnson ’s good friend Samuel Shenton founded a small fringe group dubbed DT Flat NNP Society in DT 1950s . In 1972 Johnson became DT NN of DT society after Shenton 's death , transforming DT group from a small collection of NN theorists into an organization with thousands of members . He made waves in DT national NN and became known for cheerfully insisting DT rest of DT NN was being duped by NNS , Douglas Martin wrote in Johnson ’s obituary for DT NNP York Times in 2001 . '' If NN were a ball spinning in space , EX MD be no up or down , '' Johnson told David Gates and Jennifer Smith for Newsweek in 1984 . Similarly , Johnson ’s wife Marjory believed IN DT NNP must be flat , because otherwise she MD have spent her childhood in her native Australia hanging upside - down by her toes , Martin wrote at DT NN . During his tenure as NN of DT Flat NNP Society , its ranks swelled to about 3,500 NNS . In his newsletters , Johnson wrote off such spectacles IN DT sunrise and sunset as optical illusions , discussed how Charles Lindbergh proved DT NNP was flat , and claimed IN NASA and DT moon landing were nothing but hoaxes , Eddy writes . " PRP ca n't orbit a flat NN , " Johnson told Robert J. Schadewald for NNP Digest in 1980 . " DT Space Shuttle is a joke — and a very ludicrous joke . " Ironically , Johnson lived just over DT hill from Edwards Air Force Base in southern California — DT facility where DT Air Force tests experimental aircraft , and where NASA ’s Space Shuttles landed after returning to NNP . While most of DT articles about Johnson and his fringe beliefs were written with tongue firmly in cheek , he channeled his odd sort of fame into increasing membership in DT Flat NNP Society ( as well as a starring role in an NN cream commercial ) . But PRP did n’t last : By DT NN Johnson died , DT society had dwindled again to just 100 members . DT Flat NNP Society is still around , though PRP remain little more than a tiny fringe group . " PRP is always good to question ' how PRP VBP what PRP VBP ' , " Christine Garwood , author of Flat NNP : DT History of an Infamous Idea , tells Brendan O'Neill for DT BBC . text: Solar Orbiter will orbit our nearest star , DT sun , observing PRP up close . PRP will take DT first - ever direct images of its poles , while RB studying DT inner heliosphere — DT bubble - JJ region around DT sun created by DT stream of energized , charged particles released in DT solar wind . At its closest , Solar Orbiter will come within about 42 million km of DT sun : closer than DT scorched NN Mercury , just over a quarter of DT average distance between NNP and DT sun , and closer than any European spacecraft in history . To VB PRP into this unique orbit at DT center of DT solar system , edging close to DT sun ’s poles instead of orbiting in a ‘ flat ’ plane , IN DT planets , teams at mission control in Darmstadt , Germany , have planned an intricate path . Solar Orbiter is due to launch from Cape Canaveral , Florida , on an Atlas V 411 rocket supplied by NASA in early February . Once PRP has separated from DT launch vehicle , a 22 - minute automatic activation sequence takes place , after which point DT control team takes over DT reins for DT Launch and Early Orbit Phase ( LEOP ) . These early moments in DT life of a mission are critical . PRP is now IN DT spacecraft wakes up , extends its solar arrays and teams on DT ground check its NN after DT rigors of launch . Elements of Solar Orbiter ’s NN instruments are located along a 4.4 meter ‘ boom , ” which keeps them away from DT main body of DT spacecraft and any potential interference . This boom should be deployed before certain chemical thrusters are fired , which have DT potential to contaminate DT instruments during maneuvres . Once Solar Orbiter ’s systems and instruments are up and running , PRP enters into DT “ cruise phase , ” which will last until November 2021 . During this NN , PRP will perform two gravity - assist maneuvres around Venus and CD around NNP to alter DT spacecraft ’s trajectory , guiding PRP towards DT innermost regions of DT solar system . DT first close solar pass will take place at DT end of March 2022 at around a third of DT distance between NNP and DT sun . At this point , DT spacecraft will be in an elliptical orbit WDT initially takes 180 days to complete , making a close approach of DT sun every six months . Solar Orbiter ’s path will see PRP travel out of DT ‘ plane of DT ecliptic . ” So , instead of orbiting in DT same flat plane around DT sun as DT planets , moons and minor bodies of DT solar system , PRP will ‘ leap ’ up from DT solar equator , delivering views of DT sun ’s polar regions WDT have never been seen before . To do this , Solar Orbiter will not travel in a ‘ fixed ’ orbit . Instead , DT spacecraft will follow a constantly changing elliptical path WDT will be continually tilted and squeezed , edging PRP higher and higher and closer to DT sun ’s poles . As such , DT spacecraft ’s orbit has been chosen to be ‘ in resonance ’ with Venus , which means IN PRP will return to DT NN ’s vicinity every few orbits and can again use DT NN ’s gravity to alter or tilt its orbit . While Solar Orbiter initially orbits in DT same ‘ flat ’ plane as DT planets of DT solar system , each encounter with Venus will increase its inclination . This means IN each NN Solar Orbiter encounters DT sun , PRP will be looking at PRP from a different perspective . By DT end of 2021 , DT spacecraft will reach its first nominal orbit for NN , which is set to last for four NNS . During this NN , Solar Orbiter will reach 17° degrees of inclination , allowing DT spacecraft to capture high - resolution images of DT sun ’s poles , for DT first NN . During its proposed extended mission phase , Solar Orbiter MD lift into an even higher inclination orbit . At 33° above DT solar equator , DT polar regions MD come even more directly into view . Data gathered by Solar Orbiter will be stored on DT spacecraft , then beamed ( or , ‘ downlinked ’ ) to NNP during eight - hour communication windows , via DT 35 m Malargüe ground station in Argentina . Other Estrack stations such as NNP Norcia in Australia and Cebreros in Spain will act as backups . To survive getting so up - close and personal with our star , experiencing a maximum temperature of 520 degrees Celsius and receiving a barrage of intense radiation , Solar Orbiter ’s main body and vital instruments will be protected by a titanium heat shield WDT will face DT sun at all times . Even DT spacecraft ’s solar panels , designed to take in NN from DT sun , will need to be protected . As Solar Orbiter edges closer to DT giant ball of heat and radiation , its panels — sticking out either side of DT spacecraft , bringing PRP to 18.9 m across — will need to tilt away from DT sun , limiting DT amount of light PRP take in to ensure PRP do not overheat . text: My grandfather , Jeffrey Hilliard Launius , was a 75 - NN - old farmer from southern Illinois at DT NN of DT first moon landing in 1969 . He did n’t believe IN Americans had landed on DT moon . In his estimation such a technological feat was simply not possible . Caught up in DT excitement of Apollo 11 DT summer , I MD not understand my grandfather ’s denial . In his insular NN , NN came grudgingly , however , and a moon landing was certainly a major NN . At DT NN of his death , in 1984 , Jeff Launius remained unconvinced . NNP Bill NNP recalled in his 2004 autobiography a similar story of a carpenter he worked with in August 1969 , not long after DT Apollo 11 landing : “ DT old carpenter asked me if I really believed PRP happened . I VBD sure , I saw PRP on television . He disagreed ; he VBD IN he did n’t believe PRP for a minute , IN “ them television fellers ” MD make things look real WDT were n’t . ” NNP York Times NN reporter John Noble Wilford remarked in December 1969 IN “ a few stool - warmers in Chicago bars are on record as suggesting IN DT Apollo 11 moon walk last July was actually staged by Hollywood on a Nevada desert . ” DT Atlanta Constitution led a story on June 15 , 1970 , with “ JJ skeptics feel moon explorer Neil Armstrong took his ‘ giant step for mankind ’ somewhere in Arizona . ” While poll numbers questioning DT moon landing in Detroit , Miami and Akron averaged less than 5 percent , among African - Americans in such places as Washington , D.C. , a whopping 54 percent doubted DT moon voyages . DT perhaps VBD more about DT disconnectedness of minority communities from DT Apollo effort and DT nation ’s overarching racism than anything else . As DT story reported , “ A woman in Macon VBD she knows she MD n’t watch a telecast from DT moon because her set MD n’t even pick up NNP York stations . ” As historian Howard McCurdy opined , “ To some , DT thrill of space ca n’t hold a candle to DT thrill of NN . ” An early and persistent theme has been IN as a Cold War measure DT NNP NNPS MD not afford to lose DT race to DT moon , but when failure loomed , NASA faked DT landing to save face and national prestige . PRP used DT massive funds dedicated to DT effort to “ pay off ” those who might be persuaded to tell DT truth ; PRP RB used threats and in some instances criminal actions to stop those who might blow DT whistle . Another common assertion has been IN in DT latter 1960s , with DT U.S. NN in disarray because of DT debacle of DT Vietnam War , DT racial crisis in DT cities , and social upheaval , DT Apollo program proved an ideal , positive distraction from this strife , a convenient NN designed to obscure other issues . CD story published in 1970 stated this belief as expressed by an African - American preacher : “ PRP ’s all a deliberate effort to mask problems at home , ” Newsweek quoted him saying . “ DT NNS are unhappy — and this takes their minds off their problems . ” DT first NN theorist to make a sustained case for denying IN DT U.S. landed on DT moon was Bill Kaysing , a journalist who had been employed for a few NNS in DT JJ relations office at Rocketdyne , Inc. , a NASA contractor , in DT early 1960s . His 1974 pamphlet PRP Never Went to DT Moon laid out JJ of DT major arguments WDT have been followed by other NN theorists since . His rationale offered poorly developed logic , sloppily analyzed data and sophomorically argued assertions . Kaysing believed IN a failure to land on DT moon sprang from DT idea IN NASA lacked DT technical expertise to accomplish DT task , requiring DT creation of a massive cover - up to hide DT fact . He cited as evidence perceived optical anomalies in some imagery from DT Apollo program , questioned DT physical features of certain objects in DT photographs ( such as a lack of a star field in DT background of lunar surface imagery and a presumed waving of DT U.S. flag in an airless environment ) , and challenged DT possibility of NASA astronauts ’ surviving a trip to DT moon because of radiation exposure . As John Schwartz wrote of DT NN theorists in DT NNP York Times , “ PRP examine photos from DT missions for signs of studio fakery , and claim to be able to tell IN DT American flag was waving in what was supposed to be DT vacuum of space . PRP overstate DT NN risks of traveling through DT radiation belts WDT girdle our NN ; PRP understate DT technological prowess of DT American space program ; and PRP cry murder behind every death in DT program , linking them to an overall NN . ” Ted Goertzel , a professor of sociology at Rutgers University who has studied NN theorists , told Schwartz IN “ EX ’s a similar kind of logic behind all of these groups . ” For DT most part , he explained , “ PRP do n’t undertake to prove IN their view is true ” so much as to “ find flaws in what DT other side is saying . ” And so , he VBD , argument is a matter of accumulation instead of persuasion . “ PRP feel if PRP ’ve got more facts than DT other side , DT proves PRP ’re right . ” Kaysing insisted , without any evidence whatsoever , IN even though DT Soviet Union was watching DT American effort closely , PRP was easier to successfully fake PRP than actually to land on DT moon . He even speculated IN DT chance of landing successfully on DT moon stood at 0.017 ; on what this calculation was based is a mystery and does not square with NASA estimates at DT NN , which stood at approximately 87 percent for at least CD successful landing before DT end of DT 1960s . Some moon - landing deniers concede IN EX were robotic missions to DT moon , but IN DT human Apollo landings were faked . Professional moon - landing denier Bart Sibrel has asserted IN Apollo spacecraft crews had faked their orbit around DT moon and their walk on its surface by using trick photography , but did accept NNP orbital missions . Humans MD not VB to DT moon , Sibrel and deniers of his ilk claim , because VBG beyond DT Van Allen radiation belts MD have given them lethal doses of cosmic radiation . While EX is indeed radiation both in DT Van Allen belts and beyond , and radiation ’s risks to human NN are real , contentions WDT PRP MD not be survivable are nonsense , and almost no papers in peer - reviewed scientific journals make this claim . A few NN theorists in this category even allow IN NASA landed robotically on DT moon various passive reflector mirrors used for laser ranging and other human - made objects to bamboozle DT NN . Then , EX are those who believe IN humans went to DT moon , but did so with DT assistance of extraterrestrial visitors — or IN Apollo astronauts discovered extra-terrestrial life RB . These claims ranged from gravitational anomalies to alien artifacts to alien encounters . Accordingly , this brand of NN theorist claims IN NASA covered up what had been found , in DT manner of DT discovery of a monolith at Clavius Crater on DT Moon in 2001 : A Space Odyssey . NN theorist Richard Hoagland has asserted for JJ NNS IN DT Apollo program discovered large artificial glass structures on DT lunar surface WDT has been kept from DT NN . Besides other conventions common in a cover - up , Hoagland made DT claim IN DT astronauts WDT went to DT moon had been hypnotized and any memories of extraterrestrial encounters were removed . Most interestingly , Hoagland has argued IN NASA deviously orchestrated DT origins of DT moon - landing denials as a disinformation campaign to mask DT discovery of extra-terrestrial structures on DT lunar surface . No evidence supported these assertions . While DT various claims of DT moon - landing deniers have evolved over NN , their reasons for making these claims have rested on several types of “ evidence . ” DT most significant are anomalies found in photographs or , to a much lesser degree , movies taken on DT missions . Imagery has played a critical role in DT communication of DT experience . While Apollo imagery documented in graphic detail what took place on DT moon , DT use of DT same imagery to raise questions about DT entire enterprise is an irony too great to ignore . Some 25 images have been invoked in such claims . These include images WDT do not show stars in DT background , despite NN theorists ’ insistence IN PRP should be clearly seen ; DT fact IN dust was not present on DT landing pads of DT spacecraft ; DT assertion IN shadows and lighting on DT moon are uneven and counterintuitive to DT photographs in which PRP are seen ; IN flags seem to be blowing in a breeze although EX is no wind on DT moon ; IN some rocks appear to have propmaster marks on them ; and IN Réseau - plate crosshairs sometimes seem to disappear behind objects in an image . For each of these charges , EX are completely reasonable , understandable , and convincing explanations , most relating to DT nature of photography and DT vicissitudes of shadows , lighting and exposure of film in a vacuum . I have personally had CD say to me , “ Regardless of whatever PRP might say , I will never believe IN humans have landed on DT moon . ” Deniers of DT moon landing RB point to anomalies in DT historical record to cast doubt on DT NASA account of DT Apollo program . CD of DT persistent beliefs is IN DT “ blueprints ” for DT Apollo spacecraft and Saturn V rocket have been lost , or perhaps PRP never existed . This is simply untrue . DT National Archives and Records Administration maintains a regional Federal Records Center at Ellenwood , Georgia , just outside of Atlanta , where DT records from DT Marshall Space Flight Center are housed . Those records include more than 2,900 linear feet of Saturn V records , including drawings and schematics . A similar story about DT loss of DT original broadcast video from DT Apollo 11 landing has been used to cast doubt on DT whole endeavor , causing NASA to undertake an unprecedented search for DT tapes , finding some but not all WDT were missing . Finally , in this same category of anomalies in DT historical record , NN theorists have scrutinized every word uttered by DT Apollo astronauts over DT NNS to try to catch them in some statement WDT might be interpreted as denying DT landings . Having found none , some have resorted to selectively excerpting them and in some NNS to making them up altogether . Bart Sibrel commented , “ Neil Armstrong , DT first man to supposedly walk on DT moon , refuses to give interviews to anyone on DT subject . ‘ Ask me no questions , and I ’ll tell PRP no lies . ’ Collins RB refuses to be interviewed . Aldrin , who granted an interview , threatened to sue PRP if PRP showed PRP to anyone . ” Sibrel ’s implication is DT astronauts have something to hide . Sibrel has gone further , accosting astronauts and demanding IN PRP swear on DT Bible WDT PRP walked on DT moon . Some have done so ; others refuse to engage him . In CD incident on September 9 , 2002 , Sibrel confronted Buzz Aldrin at a Los Angeles hotel and called him a “ liar , a thief , and a coward . ” At DT point Aldrin , then 72 NNS old , hit Sibrel with a right hook WDT sent him to his knees . While Sibrel pressed charges , DT Los Angeles County District Attorney ’s office declined to pursue DT incident . Most NNS who viewed video of this altercation expressed concern IN Aldrin might have hurt his hand . In a truly bizarre turn of events , on August 31 , 2009 , near DT 40th anniversary of DT first moon landing , DT satirical publication DT Onion published a story entitled “ NNP Theorist Convinces Neil Armstrong Moon Landing Was Faked . ” DT story had worldwide implications , as PRP was published as true in several newspapers . Two Bangladeshi newspapers , DT Daily Manab Zamin and NNP Nation , apologized afterward for reporting PRP as fact . PRP is bad enough when NN theorists VBP such things without foundation ; these then VBP picked up and broadcast by individuals , but when legitimate NN organizations do so PRP is much more disturbing . As CD commentator about this incident suggested , “ Their excuse : ‘ PRP thought PRP was true so PRP printed PRP without checking . ’ ” Throughout DT latter third of DT 20th century and into DT 21st , with JJ confidence in DT U.S. NN declining because of Vietnam , Watergate and other scandals and malfeasance , PRP became somewhat easier for NNS to believe DT worst . EX has been considerable research on DT parts of society WDT embrace NN theories of all types . Arguing IN conspiracism writ large represents a fundamental part of DT political system , legal scholar Mark Fenster argues IN at sum , denials of DT moon landings bring to DT fore “ a polarization so profound IN NNS end up with an unshakable belief IN those in power ‘ simply ca n’t be trusted . ’ ” During a fall 2009 trip to Vladivostok , Russia , I gave four presentations about DT moon landings to university students . In every case , DT first question from DT students was about challenges to DT moon - landing account made by NN theorists . All of them channeled DT standard criticisms of Apollo made by denialists over DT NNS . A radio talk show host , Rob McConnell , declared IN listeners to his show DT X Zone , offered astounding responses to two questions — “ Do PRP believe in ghosts , and did American astronauts really walk on DT Moon ? ” — 77 percent of respondents VBD yes to belief in ghosts , and 93 percent VBD IN PRP did not believe IN DT Moon landings had actually occurred . As Seth Shostak from DT SETI Institute remarked about this , “ DT respondents believe in ghosts , but do not VB NASA put NNS on DT moon . On DT CD hand , PRP have uncorroborated testimony about noises in DT attic . On DT other , PRP have a decade of effort by tens of thousands of engineers and NNS , endless rocket hardware , thousands of photos , and 378 kilograms ( 840 pounds ) of moon rock . ” Shostak was befuddled by this reality of modern American society . Apollo 17 astronaut Harrison Schmitt was more philosophical . “ If NNS decide PRP ’re VBG to deny DT facts of history and DT facts of NN and technology , ” he VBD , “ EX ’s not much PRP can do with them . For most of them , I just feel sorry IN PRP failed in their education . ” EX can be no question IN DT February 2001 airing of DT Fox television special NNP Theory : Did PRP Land on DT Moon ? changed DT nature of DT debate . In this instance , a major network presented a NN scenario without any serious rebuttal WDT might have been offered . As USA Today reported : “ According to Fox and its respectfully interviewed “ experts ” — a constellation of ludicrously marginal and utterly uncredentialed ‘ investigative journalists ’ — DT U.S. grew so eager to defeat DT Soviets in DT intensely competitive 1960s space race WDT PRP faked all six Apollo missions WDT purportedly landed on DT moon . Instead of exploring DT lunar surface , DT American astronauts only tromped around a crude movie set WDT was created by DT plotters in DT legendary Area 51 of DT Nevada desert . ” While DT program claimed to “ let DT viewer decide ” about DT validity of DT claims for denial of DT moon landings , PRP made no attempt whatsoever to offer point and counterpoint , thereby giving DT viewers a seriously biased view of DT issue and skewed evidence in favor of a hoax . DT most egregious violation of propriety came in DT Fox show when NN theorists claimed IN ten astronauts and two civilians had died “ under mysterious circumstances ” during DT Apollo program . DT ten astronauts in question included DT three who were killed in DT Apollo 1 fire of January 27 , 1967 , when their capsule was consumed in a flash fire during ground tests . text: Organizations concerned about our waste of natural capital are gathering for a large summit in Bonn this weekend , amid tough times for DT sustainability agenda . This NN 's focus will be on volunteer 's role in shaping sustainable societies . Although no longer DT seat of DT German parliament , DT city on DT Rhine is now home to 18 UN organizations , which work mainly in DT field of sustainable development . PRP are especially active in DT fields of environmental protection , social justice , human rights and humanitarian aid . But in recent NNS - between food crises , JJ doldrums and a range of conflicts around DT NN - NGOs concerned about how rapidly PRP are wasting our natural capital are having a tough NN getting their message across . " Those are now broken promises and broken promises have to stop , " he added . Things have changed since 1992 , Dodds VBD , and priorities have shifted . In addition , consumer behavior in industrialized NNS has widened DT gap between DT developed and developing NN . But DT gap between DT wealthy and DT struggling within DT Western NN has RB grown . text: More From Landsat : Landsat ’s Most Historically Significant Images NNP as Art : Stunning Images From SpaceImages of NNP from space give PRP a different , often enlightening and even inspirational view of our NN . DT USGS and NASA have taken some of DT more interesting images from DT Landsat satellites and added some false color , digitally produced by sensors on DT satellites , to accentuate different features and create some truly beautiful works of art . DT first Landsat satellite was launched on July 23 , 1972 . To celebrate DT 40th anniversary of DT Landsat mission , DT NN was given DT difficult task of choosing DT best of DT more than 120 images in DT NNP as Art collection . DT top five selections , based on more than 14,000 votes , are featured here in descending order ( above : first place ) . Your challenge is to select just CD of these incredible images for your computer desktop . Above : In DT style of Van Gogh 's painting " Starry Night , " massive congregations of greenish phytoplankton swirl in DT dark NN around Gotland , a Swedish island in DT Baltic NNP . Population explosions , or blooms , of phytoplankton , IN DT NN shown here , occur when deep currents bring nutrients up to sunlit surface waters , fueling DT growth and reproduction of these tiny plants . This image was acquired by Landsat 7 on July 13 , 2005 . Image and caption : NASA 's Goddard Space Flight Center / USGS . Countless lakes , sloughs , and ponds are scattered throughout this scene of DT Yukon Delta in southwest Alaska . CD of DT largest river deltas in DT NN , and protected as part of DT Yukon Delta National Wildlife Refuge , DT river 's sinuous waterways seem IN blood vessels branching out to enclose an organ . This image was acquired by Landsat 7 Sept. 22 , 2002 . Image and caption : NASA 's Goddard Space Flight Center / USGS . Small , blocky shapes of towns , fields , and pastures surround DT graceful swirls and whorls of DT Mississippi River , DT largest river system in North America . Countless oxbow lakes and cutoffs accompany DT meandering river south of Memphis , Tennessee , on DT border between Arkansas and Mississippi . This image was acquired by Landsat 7 on NNP 28 , 2003 . Image and caption : NASA 's Goddard Space Flight Center / USGS . What look IN pale yellow paint streaks slashing through a mosaic of mottled colors are ridges of wind - blown sand WDT make up Erg Iguidi , an area of ever - shifting sand dunes extending from Algeria into Mauritania in northwestern Africa . Erg Iguidi is CD of several Saharan ergs , or sand seas , where individual dunes often surpass 500 meters ( nearly a third of a mile ) in both width and height . This image was acquired by Landsat 5 on April 8 , 1985 . Image and caption : NASA 's Goddard Space Flight Center / USGS . DT scary face in this image is actually inundated patches of shallow Lake Eyre ( pronounced " air " ) in DT desert country of northern South Australia . An ephemeral feature of this flat , parched landscape , Lake Eyre is Australia 's largest lake when PRP 's full . However in DT last 150 NNS , PRP has filled completely only three times . This image was acquired by Landsat 5 on Aug. 5 , 2006 . Image and caption : NASA 's Goddard Space Flight Center / USGS .

text: Even DT minisuperspace calculation is hard to solve exactly , but physicists VBP EX are two possible expansion histories WDT potentially dominate DT calculation . These rival universe shapes anchor DT two sides of DT current debate . DT rival solutions are DT two “ classical ” expansion histories WDT a universe can have . Following an initial spurt of cosmic inflation from size zero , these universes steadily expand according to Einstein ’s theory of gravity and space - NN . Weirder expansion histories , IN football - shaped universes or caterpillar - JJ ones , mostly cancel out in DT quantum calculation . CD of DT two classical solutions resembles our universe . On large scales , PRP ’s smooth and randomly dappled with NN , due to quantum fluctuations during inflation . As in DT real universe , density differences between regions form a bell curve around zero . If this possible solution does indeed dominate DT wave function for minisuperspace , PRP becomes plausible to imagine IN a far more detailed and exact version of DT no-boundary wave function might serve as a viable cosmological model of DT real universe . DT other potentially dominant universe shape is nothing IN reality . As PRP widens , DT NN infusing PRP varies more and more extremely , creating enormous density differences from CD place to DT next IN gravity steadily worsens . Density variations form an inverted bell curve , where differences between regions approach not zero , but infinity . If this is DT dominant term in DT no-boundary wave function for minisuperspace , then DT Hartle - Hawking proposal MD seem to be wrong . DT two dominant expansion histories present a choice in how DT path integral should be done . If DT dominant histories are two locations on a map , megacities in DT realm of all possible quantum mechanical universes , DT question is which path PRP should take through DT terrain . Which dominant expansion history , and EX can only be CD , should our “ contour of integration ” pick up ? Researchers have forked down different paths . In their 2017 paper , Turok , Feldbrugge and Lehners took a path through DT garden of possible expansion histories WDT led to DT second dominant solution . In their view , DT only sensible contour is CD WDT scans through real values ( as opposed to imaginary values , which involve DT square roots of negative numbers ) for a variable called “ lapse . ” Lapse is essentially DT height of each possible shuttlecock universe — DT distance PRP takes to reach a certain diameter . Lacking a causal element , lapse is not quite our usual notion of NN . Yet Turok and colleagues argue partly on DT grounds of causality WDT only real values of lapse make physical sense . And summing over universes with real values of lapse leads to DT wildly fluctuating , physically nonsensical solution . “ NNS place huge faith in Stephen ’s intuition , ” Turok VBD by phone . “ For good reason — I mean , he probably had DT best intuition of anyone on these topics . But he was n’t always right . ” Jonathan Halliwell , a physicist at Imperial College London , has studied DT no-boundary proposal since he was Hawking ’s student in DT 1980s . He and Hartle analyzed DT issue of DT contour of integration in 1990 . In their view , as well as Hertog ’s , and apparently Hawking ’s , DT contour is not fundamental , but rather a mathematical tool WDT can be placed to greatest advantage . PRP ’s similar to how DT trajectory of a NN around DT sun can be expressed mathematically as a series of angles , as a series of times , or in terms of any of several other convenient parameters . “ PRP can do DT parameterization in JJ different ways , but none of them are any more physical than another NN , ” Halliwell VBD . He and his colleagues argue IN , in DT minisuperspace case , only contours WDT pick up DT good expansion history make sense . Quantum mechanics requires probabilities to add to 1 , or be “ normalizable , ” but DT wildly fluctuating universe WDT Turok ’s team landed on is not . DT solution is nonsensical , plagued by infinities and disallowed by quantum laws — obvious signs , according to no -boundary ’s defenders , to walk DT other way . PRP ’s true IN contours passing through DT good solution sum up possible universes with imaginary values for their lapse variables . But apart from Turok and company , few NNS VBP DT ’s a problem . Imaginary numbers pervade quantum mechanics . Thousands more gathered at DT Cape Canaveral space centre yesterday , joyously counting down DT seconds until DT rocket sent a Tesla Roadster on a billion NN journey through space . text: Katy Perry ’s “ Dark Horse ” is a fun and colorful video taking place in Ancient Egypt . However , behind DT cartoonish style of DT video , viewers are exposed to a great deal of symbolism of DT occult elite and messages regarding its power . PRP ’ll look at DT symbolism of “ Dark Horse ” . Katy Perry is a gigantic pop star , mainly because her songs and videos appeal to teens and pre-teens while her sex - appeal captures DT attention of DT older crowd . This makes her a perfect tool to be used by DT elite to communicate its messages and , as seen in previous articles about her , her songs and videos are fully used for DT purpose . Dark Horse , however , is on a whole other level . PRP is pure , relentless , in - your - face Illuminati symbolism , interlaced with references to DT elite ’s brand of black magic and mind control . Playing DT role of “ Katy - Patra ” , an Egyptian pharaoh reminiscent of ancient sex symbol Cleopatra , Katy Perry rules over her subjects DT same way DT occult elite rules over DT NN . In my article on DT 2014 Grammy Awards , I described Katy Perry ’s performance of Dark Horse as a black magick ritual disguised as a music performance . DT video goes straight to DT roots of this sorcery : Egyptian Black Magick , DT original source WDT is tapped into by today ’s dark secret societies . Before PRP look at DT actual video , let ’s look at its trailer , which contains a few interesting elements . Then DT trailer VBZ IN Kings MD travel from “ Brooklyn to Babylon ” to meet her . Babylon , which was a real ancient metropolis located where Iraq is today , was ruled by various ancient empires and has long been an epicenter of DT elite ’s black magic . Let ’s look at DT video . Dark Horse takes place in a colorful , child - friendly version of Ancient Egypt WDT ’s been “ hip - hop- ized ” about 15 % to appeal to its target audience . Katy Perry plays DT role of an evil , greedy , egotistical , despotic pharaoh named Katy - Patra who destroys men for their belongings . What a great lesson for girls under DT age of 14 . In a wider sense , Katy - Patra ’s rule represents DT occult elite taking resources and power from nations ( represented by DT kings ) . What a great lesson for DT rest of DT NN . Throughout DT video , PRP is firmly established IN Katy - Patra is an evil tyrant using black magic to control and destroy NNS while having a bunch of kitten slaves at her feet . Kind of IN what DT occult elite does . And of course , EX are all kinds of blatant symbols WDT show her to be a representative of DT Illuminati . DT above scenes tell plenty about DT occult - elite influenced mythology of DT video . Katy - Patra is looked upon by Anubis , DT jackal - headed god of death , probably because she likes to kill NNS . Behind her is DT falcon - headed god Horus wearing gold chains ( to make him look “ cool ” to young , impressionable viewers ) . Notice IN he only has CD eye – a reference , once again , to DT All - Seeing Eye of Horus . More importantly , Katy - Patra is surrounded by a golden snake , which probably refers to DT evil Egyptian god Apep . Three 6 Mafia rapper Juicy J makes an appearance in DT video and his entrance is pretty darn symbolic too . He literally emerges from some kind sarcophagus , which features DT occult elite ’s favorite symbol in lieu of eyes : DT Eye of Horus inside a triangle . On top of all of DT symbolism , PRP must never forget another part of DT Agenda : Exposing young NNS to hyper - sexualization . DT video is essentially about kings from other nations trying to wow Katy - Patra with amazing gifts . DT first suitor offers her a gigantic diamond . Katy - Patra immediately orders her kitten slaves to snatch DT diamond from DT suitor . DT above image is symbolic for a few reasons : First , PRP tells DT viewers IN Katy - Patra plays DT role of DT occult elite in DT video . Second , she CANNOT see through DT Eye ( PRP is opaque ) . She instead sees DT diamond through DT elite ’s “ eyes ” , which are focused on greed , power , and material possessions . Finally , NNS who watch music videos need to be exposed to DT CD - eye sign all DT NN . I MD stop DT video analysis here . What else do PRP truly need to VB about DT video ? Katy Perry is looking at a big diamond using an Eye of Horus to hide CD eye . This scene is a 100 % continuation of about everything I ’ve ever talked about on this site . And EX PRP is again , right in our faces , in CD of DT NN ’s most popular videos . Really , how can anyone VB IN all this symbolism is “ just a coincidence ” ? Anyhow , back to DT video . DT next suitor tries to entice Katy - Patra ’s gluttony by offering her food . Of course , things do not turn out great for DT guy , either . DT last suitor brings what Katy - Patra really wants : Power . Seeing this pyramid , Katy - Patra gets very excited because DT ’s what she , and DT elite , truly wants : Unlimited occult power over DT NN . DT illuminated pyramid essentially represents DT Illuminati ’s high - tech control over DT NN . When Katy - Patra steps on top of DT unfinished pyramid , she becomes imbued with crazy magical powers . She even grows wings . DT video ends with Katy - Patra becoming a super - Illuminati pharaoh … and everyone bows down to her … and DT suitor turns into a chihuahua . DT moral of DT video ? Illuminati . PRP is rather hard to believe IN all of this Illuminati symbolism was packed into a video WDT only lasts 3 minutes and 40 seconds . PRP is even harder to believe IN some NNS still cannot see DT obvious pattern of symbols found in mass NN WDT transcends artists , music genres , and even NN outlets . Far from being random , these symbols have been used for centuries to represent DT occult elite and PRP are now all over DT place . More than just flashing symbols , DT video Dark Horse tells a darker story : DT occult elite ’s insatiable greed for ultimate power while dismissing DT petty rulers operating underneath PRP . Katy - Patra indeed takes resources from various kings of DT NN and then destroys them . In DT end , she climbs on an Illuminati pyramid and turns into an unstoppable pharaoh imbued with magical powers . MD DT brainwashing be more obvious ? In short , Dark Horse is Illuminati propaganda aimed at NNS , using bright colors and catchy hooks to subliminally teach them who rules DT NN and who controls DT idols WDT PRP love and emulate . Of course , none of this is clearly spelled out . Instead , PRP comes at PRP through symbolism … IN a dark horse .
