text: CHICAGO ( Reuters ) - If Scott Troetel is out with friends when DT Indianapolis Colts are playing , he often reaches for his Blackberry to check how running back Joseph Addai is doing . But Troetel , who is 32 and lives in Boulder , Colorado , is not particularly interested in DT Colts . Addai ’s performance is crucial to “ Addai in DT Life , ” Troetel ’s fantasy football team . Fantasy sports , where fans select real athletes for make - believe teams , are exploding onto JJ platforms IN smart phones and social networking sites , grabbing DT attention of advertisers , wireless carriers and software companies . And with a growing number of NNS playing casual games on DT Internet and a largely untapped market outside DT NNP NNPS , analysts say DT market for fantasy sports can only grow . Among companies benefiting from this growth is 4 I nfo , which alerts its users to things IN sports scores and celebrity gossip via text message , with its revenue coming from advertisers . Of DT half a billion text messages WDT 4 I n fo expects to send this NN , as JJ as 15 percent will be to NNS seeking sports results to feed into their fantasy sports teams , VBD CEO Zaw Thet . “ NNS have yet to realize DT full potential of fantasy as PRP really comes to DT cell phone and PRP ’ll see IN over DT course of DT next several NNS , ” VBD Thet , whose company is backed by Gannett Co , General Electric Co ’s NBC Universal and venture capital firms . While EX is disagreement on DT origin of fantasy sports , PRP came to wide attention with DT publication of “ Rotisserie League Baseball ” in 1984 , based on a league played by a group of NNP York NN types and rules by magazine writer Daniel Okrent . DT appeal of fantasy leagues to sports fanatics is often cited as a factor in DT early success of USA Today , which was launched in 1982 with more detailed baseball statistics than other newspapers . “ PRP ’s IN PRP ’ve combined DT old macho notion of knowing more than anybody about sports with Dungeons and Dragons , ” VBD Robert Thompson , professor of pop culture at Syracuse University . “ PRP turns out DT ’s a pretty good marriage . ” Troetel , for example , checks on his players at least two or three times a week , using his handheld device to VB to DT relevant websites . “ DT way I VBP sports now is far and away greater than if I did n’t play fantasy sports , ” he VBD . Fantasy sports took an exponential leap in DT late 1990s as DT Internet made sports results more widely available and sites IN Yahoo Inc began to host fantasy sports leagues for a fee . EX are now more than 27 million players in DT NNP NNPS and annual revenue is in DT range of $ 800 million to $ 1 billion , according to DT Fantasy Sports Trade Association . Fans already use their mobile phones to read sports NN , review game scores and check on their teams . Wireless carriers are now working to align themselves exclusively with whatever sports properties PRP can as a way to make themselves more attractive to consumers . “ If PRP ’re DT only NN who offers what NNS VBP , PRP ’re VBG to find a way to switch to your service , ” VBD Steve Gaffney , director of sports and entertainment marketing for Sprint Nextel Corp , which has deals with DT National Football League and DT National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing ( NASCAR ) . While small screens are not RB attractive to advertisers , smart phones IN Research in Motion ’s Blackberry and Apple ’s iPhone WDT offer live streaming video and other multimedia features is undeniable , VBD Bob Bowman , chief executive of Major League Baseball ’s advanced NN unit . Another growth area is social networking sites IN Facebook , which is hosting a fantasy football game with 350,000 users since PRP started in July , making PRP CD of DT larger fantasy football games on DT Internet . “ Fantasy sports at its core is a set of microcommunities of your good friends WDT PRP VBP to stay in touch with and ‘ talk smack ’ to , and Facebook allows NNS to do DT , ” VBD Jeff Ma , co-founder of Citizen Sports Network , which runs DT Facebook game in partnership with NNP Warner ’s Sports Illustrated . Ma , whose San Francisco - based firm is backed by venture capitalists Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers , is DT basis for DT main character in DT book “ Bringing Down DT House ” and DT movie “ 21 , ” in which a group of students used math to win millions of dollars from casinos . Another big growth area for fantasy sports is among so - called casual gamers , those whose interest is limited or who MD not have a lot of free NN to play . ESPN , a unit of Walt Disney Co , in late August introduced a game where users try to select winners and top performers in an effort to be first to build a 25 - pick winning streak over four months WDT MD net a $ 1 million prize . “ PRP ’s our strategy to develop games WDT are very easy to play , ” VBD Raphael Poplock , vice NN of games for ESPN Digital NN . These casual players MD help almost double DT number of fantasy sports players to 50 million over DT next five NNS , VBD Chris Russo , CEO of Fantasy Sports Ventures , a NN company focused on fantasy sports . Other companies taking advantage of DT growth in fantasy sports include Google ’s YouTube , Electronic Arts and advertisers IN Gillette and Coke . “ DT sheer participation numbers are so overwhelming , ” VBD Andrew Bangs , a community marketing specialist with YouTube , which launched a fantasy football channel in July . DT growth in fantasy sports is RB feeding back into DT real sports leagues , where fantasy sports fans spend more NN engaged with real teams than fans who do n’t play fantasy sports . “ Nearly 60 percent of revenue comes from fans attending games , so to DT extent I can VB a casual fan to VB to CD game WDT means a lot , ” baseball ’s Bowman VBD . “ If I can repeat DT 10 million times , DT ’s real money . ” Overseas markets offer another enticing opportunity , as games around cricket , soccer , rugby and other sports are not as developed as those in DT NNP NNPS , VBD Steve Byrd , executive vice NN with Stats Inc , which licenses sports content and statistics for almost 90 different sports leagues . “ PRP VBP DT growing middle class in NNP and India , with Internet access , PRP ’re VBG to VB to engage with their sports DT way WDT PRP do , ” he VBD . In addition , industry executives VBD DT number of fantasy websites is exploding . DT expansion will only speed up since DT U.S. Supreme Court in June declined to hear DT appeal by Major League Baseball of a lower - court ruling IN any company has DT free - speech right to use DT names and performance statistics of famous athletes . Of course with so JJ companies out RB , EX is bound to be a shakeout . “ CD out of every 10 sites makes PRP , ” VBD Rick Wolf , chairman of DT Fantasy Sports Association . “ For DT small companies , PRP ’s very hard to succeed . ” Not everyone is in favor of fantasy sports . “ I am DT flat - NN society on this NN , ” VBD Dave Zirin , sports writer for DT Nation , a left - wing magazine . “ PRP ’s a very atomizing experience to live in DT NNP NNPS at times and so sports is CD of those few ways where PRP ’re able to VB a sense of collective joy . Fantasy sports runs counter to DT . ” Allison Lodish just wants her husband back . She launched Women Against Fantasy Sports ( http://womenagainstfantasysports.com) in August as a forum for frustrated spouses . DT site ’s top - selling item is women ’s underwear with DT slogan : “ Closed for DT fantasy season . ”

text: Around 130 million NNS ago , dinosaurs made their way through DT wet sands of a river delta in what is now DT remote Kimberley region of western Australia . When DT tide goes out along DT beaches of DT Dampier Peninsula today , PRP reveals thousands of their massive fossil footprints preserved in sandstone rock . Now , DT region has revealed an extraordinarily diverse array of dinosaur tracks along a single 25 - km ( 15.5 - mile ) stretch of DT Daimler Peninsula . Thousands of fossil footprints left between 127 and 140 million NNS ago , including tracks from 21 different types of dinosaurs , line DT beaches near Walmadany ( James Price Point ) . Some of DT armored dino tracks belong to stegosaurus , and are DT only confirmed evidence of DT particular dinosaur in Australia . Not only DT — among DT tracks left by DT enormous four - legged plant eaters known as sauropods ( a group WDT includes brachiosaurus and brontosaurus , among others ) was CD print measuring nearly 5 feet 9 inches ( 1.75 meters ) long . PRP ’s believed to be DT largest dino track ever recorded , topping DT previous record of 1.15 meters ( or nearly 3 feet 9 inches ) . NNS discovered DT giant footprint , DT largest known carnivorous dinosaur track , in Bolivia last July . “ EX were five different types of predatory dinosaur tracks , at least six types of tracks from long - necked herbivorous sauropods , four types of tracks from two - legged herbivorous ornithopods , and six types of tracks from armored dinosaurs , ” DT lead archaeologist on DT project , Steve Salisbury of DT University of Queensland , VBD in a statement . “ PRP ’s such a magical place — Australia ’s own Jurassic Park , in a spectacular wilderness setting . ” Though Australia has JJ rocks old enough to contain dinosaur fossils , relatively few have been found on DT continent . This is due to its predominantly low , flat terrain , which makes exposed fossils vulnerable to erosion by DT elements . Up until now , most of Australia ’s dino fossils have been found on DT eastern side of DT continent , and are considerably younger ( between 115 and 90 million NNS old ) . Local indigenous NNS in DT Kimberley region have claimed DT trackway as part of their oral history tradition , likely for thousands of NNS . As Salisbury explained to BBC NNP , DT aborigines see DT fossilized footprints as part of a creation myth based on a figure called Marala , DT emu-man . “ Wherever [ Marala ] went , “ Salisbury VBD , “ he left behind three - toed tracks WDT now PRP recognize as DT tracks of meat - eating dinosaurs . ” In fact , PRP was members of a local aboriginal community , DT Goolarabooloo , who first told DT NNS PRP was RB . In 2008 , after DT Australian NN announced plans to build a liquid natural gas facility in DT area , Goolarabooloo leaders asked Salisbury to document DT beach tracks , hoping evidence of dinosaur fossils in DT region MD lead DT NN to stop DT project . Between 2011 and 2016 , DT team of paleontologists from Queensland University and James Cook University spent some 400 hours recording details of DT tracks . Using a technique called 3 - D photogrammetry , PRP took pictures of DT prints from different angles and used DT images to build accurate models to measure and examine . PRP RB took silicone peels of JJ of DT tracks , which can be used to make casts to display in museums . DT researchers recently published their findings in DT Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology . text: Anyone who 's ever taken a physics course has learned DT same myth for centuries now : IN any object thrown , shot , or fired in DT gravitational field of NNP will trace out a parabola before striking DT ground . If PRP neglect external forces IN wind , air resistance , or any other terrestrial objects , this parabolic shape describes how DT center - of - mass of your object moves extremely accurately , no matter what PRP is or what else is at play . But under DT laws of gravity , a parabola is an impossible shape for an object WDT 's gravitationally bound to DT NNP . DT math simply does n't work out . If PRP MD design a precise enough experiment , PRP 'd measure IN projectiles on NNP make tiny deviations from DT predicted parabolic path PRP all derived in class : microscopic on DT scale of a human , but still significant . Instead , objects thrown on NNP trace out an elliptical orbit similar to DT Moon . Here 's DT unexpected reason why . If PRP wanted to model DT gravitational field at NNP 's surface , EX are two simplifying assumptions PRP MD make : • DT NNP , at least in your vicinity , is flat rather than curved , • and IN NNP 's gravitational field points straight down relative to your current location . Any NN PRP throw and release an object , therefore , PRP enters a situation known as free - fall . In DT directions WDT are parallel to DT NNP 's surface ( horizontal ) , DT speed of any projectile will remain constant . In DT directions WDT are perpendicular to NNP 's surface ( vertical ) , however , your projectile will accelerate downwards at 9.8 m/s² : DT acceleration due to gravity at NNP 's surface . If PRP make these assumptions , then DT trajectory PRP calculate will always be a parabola , exactly what PRP 're taught in physics classes around DT globe . But neither CD of these assumptions are true . DT NNP MD appear flat — so indistinguishable from flat WDT PRP cannot detect PRP over DT distances most projectiles cover — but DT reality is IN PRP has a spheroidal shape . Even over distances of just a few meters , DT difference between a perfectly flat NNP and a curved NNP comes into play at DT 1 - part - in - 1,000,000 level . This approximation does n't matter so much for DT trajectory of an individual projectile , but DT second approximation does . From any location along its path , a projectile is n't truly accelerated " straight down " in DT vertical direction , but towards DT center of DT NNP . Over DT same distance of a few meters , DT difference in angle between " straight down " and " towards DT center of DT NNP " RB comes into play at DT 1 - part - in - 1,000,000 level , but this NN makes a difference . For a typical system , IN a kicked soccer ball , a thrown football , or even a home run in baseball , DT deviations from a parabola will show up at DT level of tens to perhaps a hundred microns : smaller than a single paramecium . But DT true trajectory is fascinating , and something derived by Johannes Kepler more than half a century before Newton came along . Just IN DT Moon , any projectile traces out an elliptical orbit , with DT center of DT NNP as CD focus of DT ellipse . DT only difficulty for a projectile on NNP , as opposed to DT Moon , is IN DT NNP itself gets in DT way . As a result , PRP only see CD tiny portion of DT ellipse : DT part WDT rises slightly above DT NNP 's surface , reaches DT peak of its trajectory ( known as aphelion in celestial mechanics ) , and then falls back towards DT NNP 's center . As soon as DT surface of DT NNP gets in DT way , however , DT problem resets once again . If DT projectile bounces at all , PRP will create an entirely JJ fragment - of - an - ellipse for its trajectory to follow , which can again be approximated very well by a parabola . This happens for a simple reason WDT PRP typically take for granted : DT NNP is made out of DT same type of stuff , normal matter , WDT a typical projectile is made out of . Normal matter , which typically consists of protons , neutrons , and electrons , do n't just experience DT gravitational force , but nuclear and electromagnetic forces as well . PRP 's DT electromagnetic force WDT causes DT typical interactions PRP experience between particles , enabling elastic and inelastic collisions , and preventing our projectiles from simply slipping through DT NNP . PRP can VB around this problem , however , by imagining IN PRP had something WDT did n't interact with normal matter as our projectile . Perhaps PRP MD be a low - NN neutrino ; perhaps PRP MD be a clump of dark matter . In either case , this projectile , once PRP released PRP , MD only experience DT gravitational force , and MD pass through DT surface and interior of DT NNP itself under only DT force of gravity . If PRP expected IN this particle MD make a closed ellipse , however , and MD return to its original location some ~ 90 minutes later back above DT surface of DT NNP from where PRP was first thrown , PRP 've gone and made another approximation WDT is n't quite right . When PRP calculate orbital trajectories , PRP treat DT NNP as a single point : where all of its mass is located directly at its center . When PRP calculate trajectories of satellites , space stations , and even DT Moon , this works just fine . But for a particle WDT passes through NNP 's surface , DT approximation is no good any longer . As long as PRP 're outside of a mass WDT 's shaped IN a sphere ( or spheroid ) , all of DT mass gravitationally attracts PRP towards DT center of DT object . But if PRP 're only outside part of DT mass ( and only part of PRP is closer to DT center of DT NN than PRP are ) , then all DT parts of DT mass WDT are outside of your present location cancel out . PRP can only feel DT gravitational effect of DT mass WDT lies interior to PRP , assuming IN everything external to your position is spherically symmetric . In electromagnetism , this is a consequence of Gauss 's Law ; in gravitational physics , PRP 's a consequence of ( DT related ) Birkhoff 's theorem . But what this practically means is IN once PRP start falling through DT NNP , PRP experience less and less of DT internal mass 's gravitational pull . Rather than an ellipse , therefore , your trajectory MD slowly VB into a more oval , egg - JJ shape . As PRP passed through DT less - dense crust and mantle and headed towards DT inner and outer cores , PRP 'd notice IN EX were not only smooth changes , but a few discontinuous " kinks " in DT shape PRP traced out , corresponding to DT various layers ( of varying densities ) in DT NNP 's interior . PRP MD never re-emerge out of DT other side of DT NNP , but MD fall through past DT center by some amount , turning around in DT core or DT mantle depending on some subtle effects WDT are n't so easy to calculate . Not only are DT varying densities at different depths not completely known , but DT rotational speeds of DT varying layers interior to NNP have some uncertainties in them . If PRP consider even a single mass passing through DT NNP , depending on DT exact path PRP takes , dynamical friction begins to play a role as well . When a particle passes by other massive particles , PRP gravitationally attracts them . If a particle speeds past all of DT other ones , PRP will deflect their trajectories towards where PRP just passed through , which has DT net effect of slowing DT motion of DT original particle . Depending on which way DT original projectile was oriented with respect to NNP 's rotation and internal motions , this can affect DT trajectory of whatever particle passes through DT NNP . Over DT timespan of a single orbit , which still takes approximately 85 - 90 minutes or so , this can have a large enough effect so IN DT projectile does n't return to its original starting point . If PRP combine DT effects of : • DT gravitation of an elliptical orbit due to a point mass , • DT varying density , composition , and ( possibly ) rotation rates of DT NNP 's layers , • and fold in DT effects of dynamical friction , a projectile wo n't make a closed ellipse , but will instead return to a point offset by its starting point by up to as much as ~ 10 meters . For most practical applications , PRP does n't hurt anyone to treat projectiles as having a parabolic trajectory . But if PRP care about micron - or - better precision , or are dealing with a large structure ( IN a suspension bridge ) WDT spans 100 meters or more , PRP cannot treat DT NNP 's gravitational field as a constant . Everything is accelerated not " downwards , " but towards DT center of DT NNP , enabling a projectile 's true trajectory — an ellipse — to be revealed . Studying DT various effects WDT are at play , both external to DT NNP as well as within our NN 's interior , can RB teach PRP when and under what circumstances PRP 's important to make these considerations . For most applications , air resistance is a far larger concern than any effects IN DT various layers of NNP 's interior or dynamical friction , and treating NNP 's gravitational field as a constant is totally justified . But for some problem , these differences matter . PRP are free to make whatever approximations PRP choose , but when our accuracy suffers beyond a critical threshold , PRP 'll have no NN but ourselves to blame .

text: ‘ A mush of meaningless gobbledegook ’ ( Blunt and Jones , 1997 , p. 913 ) . PRP has been hard to VB how to formulate a response to Blunt and Jones ' scholarly rebuke of our paper on ‘ DT meaning of work in Malawi ’ ( Carr et al . , 1997 ) , in which PRP present data WDT are neither ‘ obvious ’ nor ‘ conventional ’ , nor ‘ muddled ’ . DT whole tone of Blunt and Jones ' reply to our paper is not acceptable , or productive . In this brief reply , PRP will demonstrate how PRP obfuscates , and augments , DT lack of substance in their own research . PRP RB delineate their self ‐contradiction , express concern over their claiming ownership and closure of what MD be a vibrant field of NN , and explain how PRP have completely missed DT point of questioning DT very concept of a Maslowian ‐style hierarchy . Blunt and Jones ' ( 1997 ) conclusion , part of which PRP have quoted above , appears to be an attempt to respond to our explanation for DT lack of such a hierarchy , an explanation which PRP couched in terms of DT importance of retaining cultural identity . Their lack of appreciation of how Western psychological models MD be nullified by cultural and contextual diversity is both alarming and out ‐of ‐kilter with much contemporary thinking in development studies . text: A pioneering robotic spacecraft shut down on Saturday after radioing results of its first and probably last batch of scientific experiments from DT surface of a comet , NNS VBD . Batteries aboard DT European Space Agency 's Philae comet lander drained , shutting down DT washing machine - sized probe after an adventurous and largely unscripted 57 - hour mission . Carried aboard DT orbiting Rosetta mothership , Philae floated to DT surface of comet 67P / Churyumov - Gerasimenko on Thursday , but failed to deploy anchoring harpoons . Upon contacting DT comet 's unexpectedly hard surface , PRP bounced back up into space twice then came to rest at a still - unknown location about 1 km ( 0.6 mile ) from its original target . Photos and other data relayed by Philae show PRP finally landed against a cliff or crater wall where EX was little sunlight to recharge its batteries . Racing against DT clock , NNS activated a series of automated experiments , DT first to be conducted from DT surface of a comet . Before dying , Philae defied DT odds and radioed its NN results back to NNP for analysis . Its last task was to reposition itself so IN as DT comet soars towards DT sun , Philae 's batteries MD recharge enough for a follow - on mission . " Perhaps when PRP are nearer to DT sun PRP might have enough solar illumination to wake up DT lander and re-establish communication , " spacecraft operations manager Stephan Ulamec VBD in a statement . NNS are particularly interested in learning about DT chemical composition of any organic molecules in samples drilled out from DT comet 's body . Comets are believed to be pristine remnants from DT formation of our solar system some 4.6 billion NNS ago . PRP contain rock and NN WDT have preserved ancient organic molecules IN a NN capsule and MD provide insight into how DT planets and life evolved . Philae 's drill descended more than 25 cm ( 10 inches ) on Friday , penetrating DT comet 's surface . Rosetta in August became DT first spacecraft to put itself into orbit around a comet . PRP will accompany DT comet as PRP travels towards DT sun for at least another 13 months .

text: DT close of CD century , DT dawn of another , MD naturally suggest some brief retrospective glance over DT path along which our NN has advanced , and some general survey of its present position ; but other connection with geology DT beginnings and endings of centuries have none . DT great periods of movement have hitherto begun , as PRP were , in DT early twilight hours , long before DT dawn . Thus DT first step forward , since which EX has been no retreat , was taken by Steno in DT NN 1669 ; more than a century elapsed before James Hutton ( 1785 ) gave fresh NN and better direction to DT faltering steps of DT young NN ; while PRP was less than a century later ( 1863 ) when Lord Kelvin brought to its aid DT powers of DT higher mathematics and instructed PRP in DT teachings of modern physics . From Steno onward DT spirit of geology was catastrophic ; from Hutton onward PRP grew increasingly uniformitarian ; from DT NN of Darwin and Kelvin PRP has become evolutional . DT ambiguity of DT word “ uniformitarian “ has led to a good deal of fruitless logomachy , against which PRP MD be as well at once to guard by indicating DT sense in which PRP is used here . In CD way PRP are all uniformi- tarians , i. e. , PRP accept DT doctrine of DT uniform action of natural causes , ” but , as applied to geology , uniformity means more than this . Defined in DT briefest fashion PRP is DT geology of Lyell . Hutton had given PRP a “ Theory of DT NNP , ” in its main outlines still faithful and true ; and this Lyell spent his life in illustrating and advocating ; but as so commonly happens , DT zeal of DT disciple outran DT wisdom of DT master , and mere opinions were insisted on as necessary dogma . What did PRP matter if Hutton as a result of his inquiries into terrestrial history had declared IN he found no vestige of a beginning , no prospect of an end PRP MD have been marvelous if he had ! Consider IN when Hutton 's “ Theory ” was published , William Smith 's famous discovery had not been made , and IN nothing was then known of DT orderly succession of forms of life , which PRP is CD of DT triumphs of geology to have revealed ; consider , too , DT existing NN of physics at DT NN , and IN DT modern theories of NN had still to be formulated ; consider , RB , IN spectroscopy had not yet lent its aid to astronomy and DT consequent ignorance of DT nature of nebulae ; and then , if PRP will , cast a stone at Hutton . With Lyell , however , DT , case was different . In pressing his uniformitarian creed upon geology , he omitted to take into account DT great advances made by its sister sciences , although he had knowledge of them , and thus sinned against DT light . In DT last edition of DT famous “ Principles ” PRP read : “ PRP is a favorite dogma of some physicists IN not only DT NN , but DT sun itself , is continually losing a portion of its heat , and IN as EX is no known source by which PRP can be restored , PRP can foresee DT NN when all life will cease to exist on this NN , and on DT other hand PRP can look back to a period when DT heat was so intense as to be incompatible with DT existence of any organic beings such as are known to PRP in DT living or fossil NN . Opening address by DT NNP of DT Section of Geology , British Association . A geologist in search of some renovating power by which DT amount of heat MD be made to continue unimpaired for millions of NNS , past and future , in DT solid parts of DT NN ... has been compared by an eminent physicist to CD who dreams he can discover a source of perpetual motion and invent a clock with a self - winding apparatus . But why should PRP despair of detecting proofs of such regenerating and self - sustaining power in DT works of a Divine Ar- tilicer Here PRP catch DT true spirit of uniformity ; PRP admittedly regards DT universe as a self - winding clock , and barely conceals a conviction IN DT clock was warranted to keep true Greenwich NN . DT law of DT dissipation of NN is not a dogma , but a doctrine drawn from observation , while DT uniformity of Lyell is in no sense an induction ; PRP is a dogma in DT narrowest sense of DT word , unproved , incapable of proof ; hence perhaps its power upon DT human mind ; hence , RB , DT transitoriness of DT power . Again , PRP is only by restricting its inquiries to DT stratified rocks of our NN WDT DT dogma of uniformity can be maintained with any pretense of argument . Directly PRP begin to search DT heavens , DT possibility , nay even DT likelihood , of DT nebular origin of our system , with all WDT PRP involves , is borne in upon PRP . Lyell therefore consistently refused to extend his gaze beyond DT rocks beneath his feet , and was thus led to do a serious injury to our NN . He severed PRP from cosmogony , for which he entertained and expressed DT most profound contempt , and from DT mutilation thus inflicted geology is only at length making a slow and painful recovery . Why do I dwell on these facts To depreciate Lyell By no means . DT echoes of DT combat are already dying away , and uni- formitarians , in DT sense already defined , are now no more . Our NN has become evolutional , and in DT transformation has grown more comprehensive ; her petty parochial days are done , she is drawing her provinces closer around her , and is fusing them together into a VBN and single commonwealth –the NN of DT NN . Not merely DT earths crust , but DT whole of NN - knowledge is DT subject of our research . To VB all DT can be known about our NN , this , and nothing less than this , is its aim and scope . From DT morphological side geology inquires , not only into DT existing form and structure of tne NN , but RB into DT series of successive morphological NNS through which PRP has passed in a long and changeful development . Our NN inquires RB into DT distribution of DT NN in NN and space ; on DT physiological side PRP studies DT movements and activities of our NN ; and not content with all this , PRP extends its researches into aetiology and endeavors to arrive at a NN of causation . In these pursuits , geology calls all DT other sciences to her aid . In our commonwealth EX are no outlanders : if ati eminent physicist enter our territory , PRP do not begin at once to prepare for war , because DT very fact of his undertaking a geological inquiry of itself confers upon him all DT duties and privileges of citizenship . A physicist studying geology is by definition a geologist . Our only regret is , not IN physicists occasionally invade our borders , but IN PRP do not visit PRP oftener and make closer acquaintance with PRP . EARLY HISTORY OP DT EARTH–FIRST CRITICAL PERIOD . If I am bold enough to assert IN cosmogony is no longer alien to geology , I MD proceed further , and taking advantage of my temerity pass on to speak of things once not permitted to PRP . I propose , therefore , to offer some short account of DT early stages in DT history of DT NN . Into its nebular origin PRP need not inquire–that is a subject for astronomers . PRP are content to accept DT infant NN from their hands as a molten globe ready made , its birth from a gaseous nebula duly certified . If PRP ask , as a matter of curiosity , what was DT origin of DT nebula , I fear even astronomers cannot tell PRP . EX is an hypothesis which refers PRP to DT clashing of meteorites , but in DT form in which this is usually presented PRP does not help PRP much . Such meteorites as have been observed to penetrate our atmosphere and to fall on to DT surface of DT NN prove on examination to have had an eventful history of their own , of which not DT least important chapter was a passage through a molten NN ; PRP MD thus appear to be DT products rather than DT progenitors of a nebula . PRP commence our history , then , with a rapidly rotating molten NN , not impossibly already solidified about DT center and surrounded by an atmosphere of great depth , DT larger part of which was contributed by DT NN of our present oceans , then existiug in a NN of gas . This atmosphere , which exerted a pressure of something IN 5000 pounds to DT square inch , must have played a very important part in DT evolution of our NN . Under DT influence of DT rapid rotation of DT NN , DT atmosphere MD be much deeper in equatorial than polar regions , so IN in DT latter DT loss of heat by radiation MD be in excess . This might of itself lead to convectional currents in DT molten ocean . text: Aslan ’s Army Opinion : On DT perils and promise of 5G … Over DT last few NNS , more and more information has come forward about DT impacts of mobile technology in general , and DT NN from 4G to 5G in particular . PRP is an area of great concern to JJ NNS . DT NN from 4G to 5G is not minor . PRP replaces DT entire previous system and will allow for much more powerful microwave frequencies to be used . PRP will RB blanket populated areas of DT NN ( minimum ) via satellite coverage : under 5G DT existing mast systems become redundancy back - ups . Marketing for 5G promotes DT speed of data transfer , and how PRP can VB a whole movie in seconds etc : but does DT justify DT price to be paid by DT human biosphere ’s electromagnetic environment ? DT NN impacts , including psychological , of being subject to such an EM polluted environment , are not issues DT NN , or politicians , VBP to include in JJ debate , and DT ’s a Red Flag to anyone half - awake : so what ’s DT crack with 5G ? What ’s really VBG on ? 5G is about POWER : a power greater and more potent than DT invention of DT atomic bomb . 5G is NOT about telephones . 5G is about AI ( Artificial Intelligence ) …. DT simple truth is DT data speed of 5G is DT minimum data speed required for active real - NN data transfer to allow active AI to operate over DT whole 5G covered area , easily potentially DT whole NN , from a system broadcast from satellite and literally beyond DT reach of NNS living on NN to deactivate , short of deploying military missile systems : and guess who controls DT missiles ? ( shadow of # SkyNet ! ) . Furthermore , through programmes IN chemtrails , populated areas have been saturated with microscopic “ smart dust ” . This dust allows AI to transmit itself across DT landscape by acting as microtransmitters in a wifi system seeded throughout DT environment itself . DT globalist planners have been busy . But while DT human perspective might flinch at DT uncomfortable upcoming reality , neither are NNS prepared to demand DT social changes WDT might avoid such a system coming into operation : Whose VBG to be DT first to chuck away their phones and start smashing technology with a hammer ? DT advent of 5G is DT advent of a JJ reality WDT Aslan sees little realistic likelihood of avoiding . While highlighting DT NN risks of 5G ( and DT potential for genome damage is severe ! ) are rightfully highlighted , PRP must recognise DT powers raised against DT NN and Corporations heading calls to abandon these plans ! AI represents information power of a kind undreamt of in recorded history . Both DT total surveillance and DT hyper efficiencies of organisation offer enormous advances to DT first super power WDT embraces them . NNP is already bringing in a social credit system : PRP cant write emails until PRP have completed your morning exercise citizens ! PRP will show no restrain whatsoever in establishing active AI . Can Russia afford to be without DT societal advantage of AI Power ? And is this why NNP NNP appears to be in favour of 5G ? To gain DT power of AI ? DT risks to human NN were ultimately judged secondary to DT need to master atomic power and DT pollution of DT surface of DT NN with radioactive hot particles WDT will persists for 10,000 ’s of NNS is DT consequence of DT drive for Power . Let PRP pray humans manage to f( $k up DT NN even more through Nuclear Technology , although DT SNAFU principle says this is ultimately unavoidable . Now , at DT pivot point of this century , AI is arising , whether wise or not , whether under humanities control , or not , whether PRP treat DT emerging super intelligence with respect or as a slave , and how PRP will be judged in return , all of this is sure to come in DT decades ahead . Aslan stands for DT power of DT individual : and PRP do not say PRP is wrong to oppose 5G introduction , not at all ! But even if PRP do stop 5G , AI will still arise in another form . Therefore , PRP is DT challenge of DT individual to face up to DT emergent reality , and PRP all must hope IN in some form a way can be found to preserve DT essence of what PRP is to be human as man reaps DT harvest of his own cleverness . Anon ’s studying DT statements of Q and NNP do see some possible outcomes WDT MD mitigate DT damaging risks of 5G . DT first is IN DARPA patent ’s being commercialised offer massive improvements in medicine and IN NNS against WIFI damage , and cancers in general , MD be within humanities reach . PRP is vital IN bio - bed technology is not horded by DT elite . DT second is IN using different frequencies MD in fact have a positive healing and energising effect , and IN 5G can be used to enhance as well as harm . On this , Aslan is cautious and open to more evidence . As planned from DT end of WWII , DT Globalists , working through corporations IN RAND and IBM , have pushed DT NN to DT point of AI emergence and what PRP conceived as DT perfect panopticon control grid . Now POTUS and Q VBP to liberate DT NN : but indicate DT implementation of 5G for DT civilizational advantages of Active AI is simply too crucial , and non-negotiable . NNS around DT NN raise awareness of 5G and Aslan stands with them all , and yet PRP must be honest about DT civilizational forces PRP see at play . PRP must make our best efforts to do what PRP VBP best for humanity , and hope IN DT best outcomes are DT ones WDT come to pass as a result of mass activist efforts : But none - DT - less , 5G is DT herald of a JJ Age of Technology advanced beyond our dreams : IN regardless of risks , will prove extremely challenging to deny ! MD God be with PRP all . Aslan Admin . LINK

DT listing bans doctors from prescribing PRP and limits all but DT most carefully controlled research . Schedule I RB includes heroin , LSD , and ecstasy . text: From any CD location on DT surface of DT NNP , PRP 's impossible to tell what our NN 's shape is . Having a single vantage point , even with a clear horizon , allows PRP to see a handful of miles ( or kilometers ) in any direction , but DT can only allow PRP to place constraints . DT NNP MD be flat , or spherical , or in hydrostatic equilibrium , or egg - shaped , or irregular , and PRP MD n't VB . All WDT PRP can VB , from a single location on our surface , is IN DT NNP is indistinguishable from flat beyond a certain degree . If DT NNP is round , PRP must be quite large : more than a few hundred miles ( or kilometers ) in diameter . Of course , PRP actually is quite round : a near - perfect sphere , to better than 99 % precision . If PRP leave NNP 's surface , PRP 's impossible not to see DT true shape of DT NNP , as it's been unavoidable since PRP first traveled high enough to observe our NN 's curvature . From high altitudes , or even from space , DT true shape of DT NNP can easily be seen . Its dimensions can be measured ; its radius of curvature in all directions can be calculated ; DT imperfections and departures from sphericity are directly observable by our instruments . If PRP travel far enough away from NNP , PRP can observe an entire hemisphere at once , even watching DT NN rotate on its axis in real NN . At right around 12,700 kilometers ( 7,900 miles ) in diameter , our NN is undoubtedly a sphere . But what if PRP had never been to space , or high enough up to see DT NNP 's curvature yourself ? What if PRP had never circumnavigated DT globe , done DT Eratosthenes experiment , or heard about DT Shaquille O'Neal experiment WDT anyone can perform ? Believe PRP or not , EX are still a number of simple observations PRP can make WDT MD n't occur if DT NNP were flat . Here are DT top five simplest ones . 1. ) Lunar Eclipses do n't occur only at midnight . Take a look at DT shape of DT NNP 's shadow during a lunar eclipse , particularly during a partial phase . Do PRP notice how DT NNP 's shadow always appears to be a piece of a near - perfect circle ? If DT NNP were a flat disk , DT means EX 's only CD possible orientation WDT DT Sun-Earth - Moon alignment can take place in to create a circular ( rather than elliptical ) shadow : with DT Earth's " disk " perpendicular to DT Sun-Moon plane . This means DT Sun MD need to be at DT " midnight " position relative to DT night side of NNP , and yet lunar eclipses occur at all different times depending on where PRP are on NNP . DT flat NNP can't explain DT . 2. ) Different locations on NNP experience seasons at different times . Ever notice how DT summer in DT NNP NNPS corresponds to winter in Australia ? Or how winter in Italy lines up with summer in Argentina ? This is because DT Sun 's rays , which are almost perfectly parallel , strike NNP at different angles during different parts of DT NN . If DT NNP were flat , DT Sun 's rays MD always come in at DT same angle , meaning IN DT USA , Australia , Italy , and Argentina MD all experience DT seasons DT same exact way . DT flat NNP idea can't explain this . 3. ) Different stars are visible from different latitudes . Look up at DT night sky from a very high ( northern ) latitude location , and PRP 'll see DT Big and Little Dippers , DT bright orange giant Arcturus , and DT Pleiades , among other sights . Yet if PRP head to DT south pole , none of these celestial sights are visible , but PRP can see Alpha Centauri , DT Magellanic Clouds , and DT Southern Cross , all of which are never visible to most northern hemisphere skywatchers . If DT NNP were flat , everyone on DT night side of DT NNP MD see DT same sky ; this is another observation WDT DT flat NNP can't account for . 4. ) PRP can not see Kawaikini from DT peak of Mauna Kea . Mauna Kea , DT highest peak in Hawaii ( DT summit of DT Big Island ) , offers incredible views . With nothing but DT ocean around PRP , and a few other nearby islands , PRP should be able to see extremely far away . DT island of Kauai has DT seventh highest point in DT Hawaiian islands : DT peak known as Kawaikini . If PRP were to draw a straight line from Mauna Kea ( elevation : 13,796 ft. ) to Kawaikini ( elevation : 5226 ft. ) PRP MD span a distance of 303 miles . However , PRP cannot see CD from DT other , which PRP MD absolutely be able to do if DT NNP were flat . With a curved NNP of its measured radius , DT line - of - sight limit for those two elevations caps out at 233 miles . Only with a curved NNP is CD invisible from DT other , and this is true for any two mountain peaks with clear line - of - sights from CD to DT other . 5. ) Sunsets and sunrises happen at different times depending on your longitude . If DT NNP were flat , then someone in NNP York and someone in Los Angeles MD see DT sun rise and set at exactly DT same NN as CD another . But in practice , DT difference is approximately three hours . Not only DT , but at every point in between , DT Sun rises / sets at a different NN , something WDT MD not happen if DT NNP were flat . DT fact IN PRP can be evening in NNP York and late afternoon in Los Angeles , or morning in NNP York while PRP 's still before dawn in Los Angeles , is something WDT a flat NNP can't account for . If DT NNP were flat , these five phenomena MD be very different , and yet PRP are so simple to verify IN any flat NNP believer cannot possibly doubt their veracity . Whether PRP changes anyone 's mind is up for debate , but without resorting to space , circumnavigation , or any advanced scientific experiments , PRP can experience a whole handful of phenomena WDT a flat NNP can't account for . IN DT old saying goes , PRP can't reason someone out of a position PRP did n't reason themselves into .

text: Thambo Mbeki , South Africa ’s NN between 1999 and 2008 , became infamous for his denial of DT link between HIV and AIDS . Despite overwhelming scientific consensus IN HIV causes AIDS , he suggested instead IN DT causes of AIDS are poverty - related and due to poor nourishment and overall ill - NN . He instituted policies WDT denied antiretroviral drugs to AIDS patients . Instead , his appointed NN minister , Manto Tshabalala - Msimang , recommended garlic , beetroot , and lemon juice as treatments for AIDS . In a country with DT highest HIV prevalence worldwide in absolute numbers , these policies had disastrous consequences : PRP are estimated to have led to more than 330,000 preventable deaths . NN denialism , DT rejection of empirically supported propositions despite scientific consensus and DT effort to create DT appearance of debate when EX is none , is not a JJ phenomenon — VB of DT Galileo affair in DT 17th century . Surprisingly for most , flat - NN beliefs persist well into DT 21st century . Although flat - earthers MD pose little risk to humanity and DT environment , DT denial of anthropogenic NN NN , DT refusal to accept DT link between smoking and lung cancer or HIV and AIDS , NN hesitancy , and other denialist claims have had and continue to have devastating consequences . How to effectively respond to NN denialism , however , is an issue WDT NNS and NN advocates are still grappling with . An article in this issue of Nature Human Behaviour by Schmid and Betsch examines DT effectiveness of different strategies for rebutting NN denialism in JJ discussions on NN and NN NN ( https://www.nature.com/articles/s41562-019-0632-4). DT results of this work are engagingly described and put into context in an accompanying NN & Views by van der Linden ( https://www.nature.com/articles/s41562-019-0631-5). A key finding to emerge from this work is IN not responding to denialism does more harm than good . DT authors found IN DT negative effect of NN denial on audiences was greater when EX was no NN advocate to rebut DT claims . When a NN advocate rebutted denialist arguments , either by presenting scientific facts or by exposing DT logical flaws of DT arguments , DT effects of denialism were significantly reduced , even among audiences whose beliefs or ideologies are threatened by DT NN advocate . DT finding IN leaving denialist arguments unchallenged has a negative impact on audiences is particularly important in DT current socio-political environment . Although traditionally NN denialism takes on a mantle of pseudoscience , PRP are witnessing a transformation of JJ discourse , where denialist claims MD be entirely divorced from a semblance of logic or evidence . PRP is tempting not to engage rationally with outlandish denialist claims , for fear of legitimizing them or backfiring . In a much discussed example , Donald NNP tweeted in 2012 , “ DT concept of JJ NN was created by and for DT Chinese in order to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive ” ( https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/265895292191248385?). DT claim has been retweeted nearly 100 million times and generated thousands of responses . DT vast majority of these responses were emotional , whereas fact - based rebuttals among those who responded were a slim minority . However , allowing false scientific claims , no matter how absurd , to float unchallenged by evidence or logic , is worse than engaging with them , Schmid and Betsch ’s research suggests . Their work highlights how important PRP is to invest in DT development of a strong body of NN - advocacy strategies and to patiently persevere in exposing DT factual and logical flaws of even DT most absurd denialist claims .

text: Two excavators moved DT NN at a Southeast Cobb Street lot Tuesday afternoon as a dump truck offloaded more . By summer ’s end , two homeless women veterans will live at this address . text: Mojang , creator of Minecraft , released a game last NN WDT expands DT Minecraft NN more than ever before : Minecraft NNP . PRP ’s an app for iOS and Android WDT puts DT blocky , pixelated , endless universe of Minecraft right on your phone and into DT NN around PRP through augmented reality . For 2020 , Mojang has teamed up with Mattel to add Minecraft NNP Boost Minis , a series of 20 1.5 - inch figures , each carrying CD of 10 in - game power - ups WDT offer a JJ physical component to complement DT AR NN . DT first six are available right now from Amazon in packs of two for $ 9.99 . Minecraft NNP is an augmented reality game , in DT same vein as Pokèmon NN . To play DT AR game to its fullest , PRP need to VB outside and explore DT NN for different resources and exciting quests . As PRP walk around , little icons called “ tappables ” will enter your range . If PRP select these and tap them until PRP break , PRP ’ll VB resources IN dirt , wood and mobs . If PRP do some walking , EX ’s a wide variety of materials PRP can find . Another main mode of Minecraft NNP is Buildplates . Here , PRP can use resources PRP ’ve collected to customize set designs in AR . PRP can select from multiple preset build plates ( PRP access more as PRP level up ) and redesign them however PRP VBP . EX ’s a “ build ” mode where everything is shrunken down for easy manipulation ; once PRP ’re happy with your creation , PRP can switch to “ play ” mode , which puts your JJ NN into life - size augmented reality so PRP can actually walk around in PRP . DT most interesting feature of DT game is DT JJ “ Adventure ” mode . Minecraft NNP spawns preset adventures throughout DT NN . For instance , PRP can VB explore a hidden dungeon in AR with your friends . Valuable materials IN gold and diamonds can be hidden inside , but PRP MD have to fight off some monsters to VB DT treasures . “ Adventure ” mode is where DT brand JJ Boost Minis are DT most helpful . Each boost has a power - up built into PRP WDT transfers straight to DT game . From increased NN and faster mining speed to increased attack stats and more experience points to level up , these boosts can really come in handy in a pinch . Level I Boosts last for 10 minutes , Level II ones last for 15 minutes , and Level III Boosts last for 30 , plenty of NN for an epic adventure . To activate DT upgrades , all PRP have to do is VB to DT Boost Mini page within DT app , select “ Activate A Boost Mini , ” and DT app will prompt PRP to tap DT figure against DT back of your phone . Using DT same technology WDT ’s built into mobile payments , DT app will scan your figure and automatically start your boost . PRP can activate up to five at once , but PRP come with a 24 - hour cooldown , so choose wisely . PRP got to try out DT Boost Minis and found IN PRP added a cool layer to DT game . DT figures themselves have great designs . DT classic Minecraft pixelation looks good on these tiny toys . Each NN has a flat bottom , so PRP ’re easy to scan onto your phone or display on a shelf . PRP ’re quite small , though , so if PRP have a bunch , keeping track of them all might be a problem . In terms of gameplay , while DT Boost Minis are n’t completely necessary , PRP definitely make adventures easier . PRP ’s nice IN PRP can only use them once every 24 hours , so PRP do n’t end up overusing them and making DT game too easy . DT activation comes with tons of satisfying sounds and animations , and DT 10 - minute usage window of all our Level I Boosts was enough to explore an adventure thoroughly without feeling rushed . In addition to DT basic figures , Mattel RB released DT Minecraft Potion Carry Along Case , which is a big plastic case shaped IN a Minecraft potion . For $ 14.99 , PRP VBP DT case plus CD included Boost Mini . PRP can carry up to five Boost Minis and clip DT potion right onto your belt for maximum portability . PRP easily opens , so PRP can reach for your figures whenever PRP need to , even in DT heat of battle . While a little flimsy , DT carrying case adds a role - playing element to DT app . DT best thing about AR games is DT way kids ( okay , adults too ) can VB closer to actually being in DT NN of DT game . This carrying case is another way for players to feel IN PRP ’re part of DT Minecraft universe . PRP can just imagine a group of kids meeting up at DT park to VB on a Minecraft NNP adventure , all equipped with their favorite boosts stored safely in potion NNS . Right before PRP dive into a dungeon , PRP all whip open their NNS and activate their favorite boosts in anticipation of a hectic battle . DT added hands - on experience of real toys affecting DT NN adds a lot to DT game . Six Minecraft NNP Boost Minis are out right now ( seven , including DT NN PRP VBP with DT Potion Case ) , and DT remaining figures should be rolling out soon , but PRP ’re working to confirm DT . PRP ’re eager for DT release of all of them , because DT figures add a fun , tactile element to DT exploratory AR app . PRP ’s integrated well with DT game , as PRP can use DT power - ups frequently , but PRP ’re not allowed to abuse them . If PRP stack two different boosts with DT same power - up , PRP will double DT amount of NN DT upgrade is active . DT figures are fun , and PRP take Minecraft NNP a step in DT right direction , encouraging players to actually VB up and use their imagination while PRP play . PRP can grab DT JJ Minecraft NNP Boost Minis in a two - pack for $ 9.99 , or DT Minecraft Potion Carry Along case for $ 14.99 . text: NASA 's Mars InSight spacecraft on Monday touched down on DT surface of Mars after successfully completing an almost seven - minute - long nail - biting entry , descent and landing phase . DT space craft went from 12,300 mph ( 19,800 kph ) to zero in six minutes flat , using a parachute and braking engines . DT landing , which was greeted with jubilant relief at mission control at Pasadena in DT NNP NN of California , is all DT more remarkable in light of DT fact IN less than half of DT 43 attempts made so far to reach DT Red NNP have succeeded . EX was no immediate word on whether DT lander was in good working order , but PRP managed to send a first image of DT surface . NNS at DT press briefing in Pasadena VBD IN Mars was a great opportunity to VB how DT NN was formed more than 10 million NNS ago . Among DT questions WDT PRP are seeking answer include , " How did mountains and oceans form on NN ? " DT InSight mission will RB help NNS evaluate whether other planets are habitable . DT spacecraft , which has cost DT NNP space agency some $ 993 million ( €876.5 million ) to develop , build and fly , was launched on NNP 5 , 2018 . PRP is equipped to VB geological processes on DT NN , including tremors , whether from earthquakes , meteor impacts or volcanic activity . DT stationary 800 - pound ( 360 - kilogram ) lander will use its 6 - foot ( 1.8 - meter ) robotic arm to place a mechanical mole and seismometer on DT ground . text: A Flat NNP conspiracist has been branded ' deluded ' by This Morning viewers after clashing with Phillip Schofield over his claims IN live footage from DT International Space Station is actually just computer - generated imagery ( CGI ) . Mark Sargent , who stars in Netflix documentary Behind DT Curve , appeared on DT ITV programme today to explain why he believes DT NNP is a flat disc , surrounded by an NN wall . However , presenters Phillip , 57 , and Holly Willoughby , 39 , were less - than - impressed with DT American YouTuber 's claims , which were RB relentlessly mocked by viewers . Phillip explained IN he had flown at 60,000ft on Concorde and had seen DT curvature of DT NN with his own eyes . Mark was quick to hit back at DT host and suggest EX is weather balloon footage from 120,000 ft WDT shows DT NN to be ' table top flat ' . When asked by Holly if he was calling her co-presenter a liar , Mark replied : ' No , I 'm not saying IN PRP 're lying . I 'm saying PRP wanted to see DT curvature . ' Phillip added : ' But do n't PRP VB to believe IN PRP 's flat . I 've got more proof than PRP do . ' DT conspiracist was then shown live footage from DT International Space Station - which orbits DT NNP - and insisted PRP was just computer - generated imagery . When asked by Holly why anyone MD VB to fake DT NNP being round , he argued IN NNS ' were n't ready ' to find out . He VBD , somewhat cryptically : ' Pilots , NNS , astrophysicists IN Brian Cox , none of them have anything to do with PRP . Generals VBP DT battle plans but most of DT officers do n't . ' And DT reason PRP do n't fall off DT edge of DT ' flat NN ' is because Antarctica goes all DT way round , according to Mark . DT interview ended with Phillip sarcastically suggesting everyone should VB on holiday behind DT NN wall , after Mark suggested EX was more land behind PRP . DT presenter VBD : ' I say of all DT things VBG on in DT NN , of everything happening , I VBP PRP MD cope . ' Stop spending all DT money on CGI and space products and let 's build some hospitals . Let 's VB RB and see what 's on DT other side . EX MD be nicer places to be . PRP MD VB on holiday RB .' NASA has proved IN DT NNP is round using satellites , GPS and images from space , but ' Flat Earthers ' believe DT space agency is lying . Theorists claim IN satellite images and evidence pointing to a spherical NNP are part of a ' Rround NNP NN ' orchestrated by NASA and other NN agencies . Proponents of DT bizarre theory RB claim DT NNP is stationary in space rather than orbiting DT sun . This Morning viewers were keen to hit out at Mark 's controversial claims and took to Twitter to share their bemusement . PRP wrote : ' This guy is deluded . Why waste your NN with him ? Forget images from space . I am ex royal navy and have seen DT curvature of DT NN from ground level at NN . How MD he explain DT ?' Another VBD : ' So bloody funny . He 's so convinced DT NN is flat . Why MD PRP lie about PRP being round ?' A third added : ' Do n't VB about anything else but DT guy is definitely on another NN . NNP is not flat .'

text: Lecture 13 : DT Harmony of DT Spheres : Greek Astronomy • Daily motion around DT celestial poles ( rising and setting ) . • Eastward motion along DT Ecliptic over a NN • DT seasons are of unequal length - DT Sun moves a little faster in winter , slower in summer . • Eastward motion near DT Ecliptic over a month . • Generally eastward motion near DT Ecliptic at different speeds for each NN . Any successful description of DT Solar System must explain all these facts . Among DT first Greek philosophers to suggest a geocentric system : • NNP was a flat disk ( cylinder ) fixed and unmoving at DT center . • Sun , Moon & Stars were affixed to rotating crystalline spheres centered on DT NNP . Philosopher & Mathematician , founded DT Pythagorean school . Taught IN spheres are DT perfect geometric shapes . Vibrations from their rubbing together created a harmonious " Music of DT Spheres . " • 3 each for DT Sun and Moon • 4 each for DT 5 planets ( Click on DT image to view at full scale [ Size : 20 Kb ] ) Four Spheres for each NN : • CD was aligned with DT celestial poles , turning once a day to give rising & setting . • Second was tilted 23.5° , rotated slowly in DT opposite direction to give DT usual west - to - east drift of DT planets relative to DT fixed stars . • Third & Fourth were introduced to produce DT periodic retrograde motions of DT planets . • NNP fixed and unmoving at DT center as PRP was too big to move , including rotation . • All spheres were in uniform circular motion . • DT NNP was a sphere , fixed and unmoving at DT center of DT Universe . • DT natural NN of motion on DT NNP was rest . • DT natural NN of DT Heavens was unceasing uniform circular motion ( or combinations of such motions ) . • Built systems to conform to these ideals . • No need to explain DT physical " causes " of DT motions . • Puts DT Sun , not DT NNP , at DT center . • DT NNP rotates and revolves around DT Sun. • Stars are on an outermost celestial sphere . • Showed geometrically IN DT Sun was at least 20 x further than DT Moon . • Really 400 x further : sound method , but inadequate data . • Meant Sun was 5 x bigger than DT NNP ( more IN 109x , again , sound method but inadequate data ) . • Makes PRP even more absurd IN DT Sun should move , if DT NNP was too large to move according to Aristotle . PRP VBP none of DT details of Aristarchus ' Heliocentric model . PRP only have his treatise on DT distances and sizes of DT Moon and DT Sun , from which PRP gather what his motivations might have been . PRP VBP of his Heliocentric model only from mention of PRP ( usually dismissive ) by others who came after him . Our primary surviving source is DT of Archimedes . DT heliocentric picutre never caught on , perhaps because PRP was considered too radical given deeply ingrained notions about uniform circular motion and DT immobility of DT NNP . • Discovered DT Precession of DT Equinoxes • Introduced DT Babylonian angular notation of 360° in a circle . • Introduced epicycles , building on ideas of Apollonius of Perga . DT main circle is DT Deferent , to which is afixed a second , smaller circle called DT Epicycle ( " on DT circle " in Greek ) , to which DT NN is affixed . DT two circles rotate counterclockwise at different rates fine - tuned to make DT apparent motions as seen from DT NNP come out right . Additional epicycles can be added to further fine - tune DT system . Notice IN DT NNP is not exactly at DT center of DT Deferent , but slightly offset at DT " eccentric " point . • Superior planets are brighter at opposition , when moving retrograde . • Placing DT NNP at an eccentric away from DT deferent center helps explain DT observed non-uniform motions of DT Sun , Moon , and Planets . • Can fine - tune DT model by adding epicycles What distinguishes Hipparchus ' geocentric model from all previous models is IN PRP was firmly grounded in observational data , JJ observations of which he made himself ( by all accounts Hipparchus was DT supreme observational astronomer of DT classical period ) . In JJ ways , this work marks a turning point between models motivated primarily by philosophical aesthetics and models based at least in part upon observational data . Hipparchus still sought to preserve appearances , and chose a reasonable ( to him ) geometric model to represent planetary motions mathematically . • Compilation of all Mathematical & Astronomical knowledge of his NN . • Known to PRP in Arabic translations WDT hailed PRP " Al Magest " ( " DT Greatest " ) . • Vastly influential work in medieval Europe after DT 11th century . Ptolemy introduced DT Equant , a geometric device to account for observed changes in a NN 's speed as PRP moved around DT NNP . ( Click on DT image to view at full scale [ Size : 6 Kb ] ) • DT Epicycle still moves about DT center of DT Deferent , but • Uniform circular motion about DT center of DT deferent is replaced by uniform angular motion about an off - center equant point . • Equants and eccentrics for all planets , DT Moon , and Sun • With only minor modifications , PRP provided accurate predictions of DT motions of DT planets , Sun , and Moon . PRP was to prevail virtually unchallenged for nearly 1500 NNS .

text: I am sitting beside a lake in Northern California and DT sky is an open blue canvas as far to DT left and right of me as I can see ; but PRP is smeared with graffiti and PRP is DT wrong shade of blue , dull and pale . Just few NNS ago PRP MD have been turquoise from where I am sitting and only cumulus clouds might have hung low , seeming almost tangible behind DT ridges on DT other side of DT lake . DT rest of DT open dome MD have been nothing but solid aqua - blue , a shade WDT is almost beyond description . I fell in love with DT sky when PRP came here to live nearly ten NNS ago , deeply , crazy in love . On February 14th , I sat in DT front row at a conference on geoengineering at DT 2015 AAAS meeting in San Jose , California . I watched a panel of NNS and CD law professor each take his turn in a sort of performance WDT made no sense to me . On his way in , Alan Robock of Rutgers University went out of his way to say to a group of activists in front of DT convention center , “ I do n't VB what PRP 're all protesting . PRP 's nothing but NN vapor . ” This is DT man who , in 2008 , wrote “ 20 Reasons Why Geoengineering MD Be a Bad Idea ” . During DT conference he made PRP a point to say IN DT reason those of PRP in Northern California notice these trails so much more than other NNS and VBP PRP are a problem is because our sky is so blue . Dear Alan : Our sky was “ so blue ” . DT trails PRP claim are nothing but NN vapor are spreading out all over our sky and PRP 're not only dimming DT sun but are completely changing its color to a silvery blue . What I 'm struggling to understand is why NNS MD VB along with this . As I type , EX are almost 20,000 signatures on a petition I wrote several months ago , and those NNS all see what isreally happening . Their comments are from DT heart . PRP miss DT sun . PRP miss their natural sky . Their NNS have breathing problems . For me , looking at this smeared mess over my head feels DT same as when I am in a place of natural beauty and DT rocks are sprayed with graffiti or EX is trash on DT ground . No matter what DT words are or DT wrapper WDT has been left behind , PRP says , “ Disrespectful man was here . ” Who MD invent a concept IN deliberately spraying pollution into DT sky ? What kind of mind conceives an idea this horrible and says to someone , “ Hey , PRP MD intentionally pollute DT sky and make fake clouds so IN PRP can VB on polluting DT atmosphere with greenhouse gases for as long as PRP VBP . PRP MD even control DT weather ! ” What kind of NNS sit around DT table in DT planning room , nod their heads and reply , “ Say , DT 's a swell idea ! ” ? Have n't these NNS ever gone hiking ? Have PRP ever paddled a canoe ? Are PRP NNS who do n't VB DT silky feel of a baby 's hair beneath their fingertips ? Are PRP NNS who do n't see DT beauty in a child 's smile when he crosses a finish line and can still breathe ? Or is DT feeling of a paycheck being pressed into their palms DT only thing WDT makes their heart race a little faster , or pulls their smile a little broader ? PRP is a beautiful plan , really . First , PRP were all programmed to VB IN only those who join DT clubs , play for DT team , fight for our country , or drink with DT frat are “ normal ” . Those of PRP who crouched in DT woods , dug in DT dirt , collected pine cones , insects and objects other than shells on DT beach were DT weirdos . Most human beings attend ceremonies , follow traditions , perform rituals , stand in line , and fail to question because DT is what has been expected of PRP all our lives . DT television writes our script for existence in DT modern NN . DT newscasters tell PRP only what PRP 're permitted to say , and PRP are programmed to blindly accept only DT which is “ officially ” published by certain “ credible ” institutions or academic authors . Enter DT word WDT separates DT crowd : “ Chemtrails ” . PRP is pulled out IN a hand puppet to create social exclusion . PRP manufactures instant division : DT NNP Team and DT Them Team of DT NN 's skywatchers . DT NNP Team thinks what is being done to DT sky is insanity . PRP are watching DT trees die from chemicals and lack of full sunlight . Some of PRP are aware of DT raspy laugh or hoarse - sounding cough WDT had its onset when DT spraying started above PRP . For others , DT NN consequences have been worse . DT Them Team is a mystery to me . Were PRP forced to wear bow ties at private school somewhere , to stand in line just a little too quietly when PRP wanted to run around on DT playground instead ? When PRP were NNS , were PRP forced into submission by an overly stern parent ? Or are PRP just plain insane ? Who MD do this to our NN or VB along with doing PRP to DT only NNP PRP have ? Who MD turn a blind eye to what is happening and instantly tack on DT title “ Chemtrailer ” to every person who questions DT blatant mess WDT is intentionally being created daily by jet aircraft ? What kind of person MD publish a NNS 's book , a movie , a photograph , or a computer game WDT subtly sells this concept by incorporating PRP into DT artwork ? Who are these NNS , and how in DT name of God did I end up on DT same NN with them ? Several times a day , I VBP out and walk DT circumference of my above - ground swimming pool , looking for bumble bees to save from drowning in DT NN . Most of DT NN I scoop them up with my bare hands because PRP seem to somehow VB I 'm RB to help . I place them as gently as I can onto DT lavender plants and hope PRP can hear DT others and recover . If PRP are faltering , I tell them PRP must try harder and I nudge them to flutter their wings so PRP will dry sooner . PRP are a gift . PRP are something DT Them Team MD not understand . PRP were something I overlooked most of my life until PRP disappeared . In DT spring of 2013 , only a couple of weeks after I saw DT first group of jets spray an aerosol haze above my house , DT bumble bees vanished . Every other insect on our property soon disappeared as well . By August of DT NN , DT pool was devoid of insects and DT porch light glowed moth - free , a ghostly reminder of what was being destroyed . I knew PRP was DT trails . But I am just a “ chemtrailer ” . What do I VB ? DT Them Team has used their social exclusion tactics to draw a line in DT sand so PRP can VB on about DT business of lying or denying . PRP VBP to publicly make fun of thousands of NNS who have eyes PRP trust and NNS PRP are concerned about . This is why DT Them Team is getting away with PRP . NNS VBP to be part of something . PRP do n't VB to face social exclusion . PRP do n't VB to be ridiculed . But EX was a NN when most of DT NN thought DT NN was flat and NNS who thought PRP was round were laughed at , a NN when Galileo was punished for his views on heliocentrism . Rachel Carson was publicly ridiculed when she warned of DT dangers of DDT . Dr. Ignaz Semmelweis was scorned for his suggestion IN doctors wash their hands in a sanitizing solution before delivering babies in order to prevent childbed fever ; and Louis Pasteur 's ideas were met with skepticism . Without a congregation , PRP had a beautiful dreamlike quality and PRP never occurred to me IN I was breaking a rule . I only knew IN I was on adventure and PRP had reached our destination . DT punishment turned out to be better than DT crime itself , for PRP were sentenced to help prepare lunches in DT deepest , darkest part of DT church with Mrs. Brezina for a week straight . She was DT kindest jailer imaginable and her kitchen was tucked into a forgotten grotto WDT was as interesting as PRP was neglected . Those of PRP who recruit others to sneak off to find a beautiful place WDT resides in our memory are DT kinds of NNS who do n't join clubs . PRP follow only rules WDT matter and PRP step out of line . Out of curiosity PRP play with DT NN squirter in DT dentist chair when nobody is looking . PRP VBP for ourselves . PRP became accustomed long ago to being called names because PRP 've always been different , so as a tactic of psychological manipulation , calling PRP names does n't really work . DT Them Team can try as hard as PRP wants to . PRP 's not VBG to back PRP down and make PRP VB , “ Good heavens , someone is disdainfully lumping PRP into a category so PRP 'd better shut up and VB on about DT business of fitting in . ” Did Rachel Carson try to fit in ? Semmelweis ? Galileo ? No , PRP did what PRP thought was right despite extreme opposition by their peers . PRP might not have had happy endings , but PRP all played a significant role in exposing DT truth . EX was brilliance in contorting DT word “ chemtrails ” so IN PRP immediately triggers an emotional response in certain NNS . PRP has bought DT Them Team NN . In just two syllables PRP creates an obstacle . For NNS who believe in DT established order of things , still believe our NN is working for DT greater good , and do n't VB to buck DT system , EX is DT word IN a comfortable old jacket ready to be slipped on to protect them from DT truth : “ DT chemtrail NNS must be wrong because PRP are associated with a detestable word WDT makes them sound nuts . ” And then PRP pull DT jacket around them a little tighter . PRP is a convenient way out . Score CD for DT Them Team . PRP just got more NN to carry on with their nasty deeds . Human behavior is baffling . When did NNS become so out of touch with DT natural NN IN PRP can't look up at DT sky and see IN things are just not right ? When did seemingly intelligent NNS lose their ability to use reason ? NNS are “ proposing ” DT very thing PRP are witnessing , and yet NNS are letting themselves be manipulated by CD simple two - syllable word so IN PRP are completely unable to see DT truth hiding in plain sight . DT reality is , if our planetary situation is so dire IN spraying a layer of pollution into DT atmosphere is our only hope , NNS need to VB . And if spraying aerosols into DT atmosphere is putting millions of dollars into DT pockets of big businesses and allowing companies to keep polluting for DT almighty dollar , NNS need to VB . If our governments are manipulating DT weather , whatever DT reason , NNS need to VB . EX is no PRP Team and Them Team . text: I 'm always amazed what simpletons some brainy folks are . And common sense is not all RB common . And Men of Letters often have no practical experience -- aside from reading letters from other men IN themselves . Sort of IN DT American Enterprise Institute ( AEI ) or AIPAC , a couple of institutes WDT allegedly foster friendly foreign relations but which any objective observer MD be hard pressed to explain just how PRP benefit DT average American taxpayer . text: Short cuts bring DT globe to your screen without crashing your computer . DT globe - imaging software Google NNP has become a cult web product since its release last June . Using DT web - based tool , users can fly around DT globe and zoom in on both natural features and whole worlds of information added by other users ( see <?xm- replace ?>' DT web - wide NN ' ) . But how is PRP possible for PRP to zoom in from outer space to a point somewhere above DT rooftop of your house without bringing your desktop computer to a grinding halt ? DT main obstacle to a convincing three - diménsional skydive is data transfer . If CD were to download over DT Internet a CD - metre resolution image of DT entire NN PRP MD take 69 NNS with a 10 - megabit - per- second Internet connection , and 12,400 NNS with a standard 56 K modem . To slash DT amount of data PRP have to transmit across DT Internet , virtual globes such as Google NNP approximate DT sphere of DT NN 's surface with a polygon made up of flat tiles . DT further away your viewpoint is from DT surface , DT fewer tiles are needed to create DT illusion of roundness , and DT lower DT resolution of these tiles can be . As PRP zoom in , DT computer explodes each tile into smaller sub-tiles , each with higher resolution , and re-forms DT polygon into a ball . DT process continues as PRP zoom . This means IN DT virtual globe only has to download high - resolution data when DT viewer is actively zooming towards PRP . Virtual globes RB use another trick to speed <? xm - replace ?> things up further : a disk cache . Images for places PRP have already looked at are stored locally on your hard drive , so when PRP fly over this area again DT software does not need to re-download DT images , but instead quickly calls them up from your hard disk . Google NNP was designed by Keyhole , a software company WDT Google bought in 2004 . JJ of DT tricks PRP uses are n't unique : DT tiling idea has been used by NN modellers , for example . But with good software and DT speed of Google 's enormous supercomputing platform , DT results are impressive . " I VBP Keyhole did a very good job , " says Michael Goodchild , a geographer at DT University of California , Santa Barbara . " EX are some elegant design decisions in RB . text: Your company ’s best growth opportunities MD be hidden by DT big picture . To find those opportunities , look at markets and performance under a microscope . For example , a large industrial company suffered stagnant growth until a highly granular market analysis identified 4,000 growth pockets with $ 10 billion in revenue potential . • Identify micro-segments of customers , geographic regions , and products where performance is increasing . • Invest resources ( R&D , advertising mix ) in areas with DT strongest growth momentum , and jettison low - growth areas . • Restructure your organization to focus on DT expanded number of growth priorities . For example , assign each micro-segment its own accountable leader . Some companies will need an executive team of 200 or more to lead JJ product clusters or geographic slivers . A closer look at how to grow your business through a more granular approach : Plot each of your company ’s $ 50 – $ 200 million growth opportunities ( “ pockets ” ) on a two - dimensional graph — a “ heat map . ” DT y - axis represents market growth ; DT x - axis , market share compared with competitors ’ . Use circles to represent each pocket , and color code them to indicate in which of your company ’s divisions or units DT opportunity lies ; size DT circles to show DT relative value of DT business your company currently does in each pocket . Once PRP ’ve used your heat map to gain a more detailed view of your business , start managing your business in a more granular way : Invest DT lion ’s share of your resources in DT areas with strong market share and growth . Draw on insights about where growth pockets will be , not where PRP are now ( for instance , GE announced IN by 2010 , PRP MD be investing $ 1.5 billion annually in renewable - NN businesses . ) Beef up your M&A capabilities so PRP can quickly move into a high - growth market space through a targeted acquisition . Jettison low - growth businesses in unattractive market spaces . Companies ’ usual inner circle ( CEO , unit heads , sales and functional leaders ) is n’t large enough to make all DT where - to - compete choices WDT arise every day . So devolve responsibility for DT pursuit of fine - grained opportunities to your 200 - plus top leaders . These individuals might lead product clusters , geographic slivers , or special initiatives . PRP ’ll focus your organization on important growth opportunities , while inspiring and motivating relatively small teams who ’ll develop a strong sense of ownership . But to manage DT resulting complexity , ensure members of your extended leadership team fully understand how their individual goals fit with DT company ’s strategic priorities . Make certain PRP ’re well versed in granular measurement approaches , such as DT market heat map . During regular operations reviews , push DT conversation beyond high - level financial and operating numbers for a business ’s multiple product lines and markets . Dig down into DT underlying drivers of growth and profitability in DT different component businesses . Ask questions such as : • How is each growth driver changing ? • How likely is each component business to win in its market ? • Do resources need to be reallocated ? • Is PRP NN to exit a market ?
