text: Michael Moore 's latest anti-Republican documentary tanked at DT box office compared to his movies from a decade ago — “ Fahrenheit 11/9 ” barely registered , with a $ 3.1 million take on its first weekend . DT title was a play on his 2004 documentary “ Fahrenheit 9/11 ” WDT sought to expose mishandlings in NNP George W. Bush ’s White House following DT attacks on Sept. 11 , 2001 . DT latest film , as Fox NNP previously reported , sought to do DT same to NNP NNP at a key NN for DT country : DT 2018 midterm elections . “ Fahrenheit 11/9 ” took in $ 3.1 million in 1,719 cinemas — a large debut for most documentaries but a fraction of DT $ 23.9 million opening of “ Fahrenheit 9/11 . ” DT film went on to make $ 222.4 million worldwide , a record for documentaries . Moore ’s JJ film , which examines DT rise of NNP and other developments IN DT NN crisis in his hometown of Flint , Mich . , had been predicted to open with $ 5 million to $ 8 million , but did n't even come close . This , despite a surge in success for documentaries at DT box office in DT past few months , including “ RBG , ” ‘‘ Wo n’t PRP Be My Neighbor ” and “ Three Identical Strangers . ” “ Fahrenheit 11/9 , ” DT first release from former Open Road chief executive Tom Ortenberg ’s JJ distributor , Briarcliff Entertainment , MD have decent weeks ahead leading up to DT November elections . ComScore ’s PostTrak survey found IN 82 percent of viewers gave PRP four out of five stars . PRP landed an “ A ” CinemaScore . “ Those who did see PRP really enjoyed PRP , ” VBD Paul Dergarabedian , senior NN analyst for comScore . “ NNS have VBN : Should PRP have gone limited ? Should PRP have gone wide ? I VBP PRP needed to VB PRP out RB nationwide with midterms six weeks away . But PRP ’s very easy to second - guess how to release a documentary IN this . PRP ’s CD of DT most difficult types of films to release . ” Last month , Moore , whose 2002 documentary “ Bowling for Columbine ” won an Oscar , made headlines when DT trailer for “ Fahrenheit 11/ 9 ” referred to NNP as “ DT last NN of DT NNP NNPS . ” DT anti-Trump filmmaker sat down with MSNBC ’s Chris Hayes , who asked Moore about DT bold claim . “ I VBP PRP ’s possible , absolutely . I VBP IN PRP have someone in DT White House who has no respect for DT rule of law , who dislikes democracy by an incredible degree , which does n’t make him really any RB much different from other billionaires or CEOs because their businesses are not democracies , ” Moore responded . Moore VBD NNS IN NNP “ rule by fiat ” and do n’t VB when other NNS have a voice in their decision - making . “ PRP RB VBP to take home DT bulk of DT money with them . So this is — putting somebody IN DT in charge of a democracy is a very dangerous thing , and especially , PRP ’s more dangerous with him because he has a complete lack of ideology , ” Moore told Hayes . DT gothic family fantasy “ DT House With a Clock in Its Walls ” exceeded expectations to debut with an estimated $ 26.9 million in ticket sales at DT weekend box office . PRP was easily DT biggest draw on a quiet weekend at North American movie theaters , where DT other JJ wide releases all disappointed or downright flopped . Dan Fogelman ’s “ Life Itself ” and DT home invasion thriller “ Assassination Nation ” both barely made a blip in nationwide release . Though Fogelman ’s “ This Is PRP ” is CD of TV ’s top-rated series , his “ Life Itself ” bombed with $ 2.1 million despite a starry cast including Olivia Wilde , Oscar Isaac and Antonio Banderas . Fox NNP ’ Brian Flood and DT Associated Press contributed to this report .

text: An asymptotic theory is presented for calculating co-seismic potential and geoid changes , as an approximation of DT dislocation theory for a spherical NNP . This theory is given by a closed - form mathematical expression , so IN PRP is mathematically simple and can be applied easily . Moreover , since DT asymptotic theory includes sphericity and vertical structure effects , PRP is physically more reasonable than DT flat - NNP theory . A comparison between results calculated by three dislocation theories ( DT flat - NNP theory , DT theory for a spherical NNP and its asymptotic solution ) shows IN DT true co-seismic geoid changes are approximated better by DT asymptotic results than by those of a flat NNP . Numerical results indicate IN DT sphericity effect is obvious large , especially for a tensile source on a vertical fault plane .

text: DT NN of NN is undoubtedly becoming more mysterious by DT day . text: A NN - run NN of Gilead ’s remdesivir , perhaps DT most closely watched experimental drug to treat DT novel NN , showed IN DT medicine is effective against NNP - CD , DT NN caused by DT NN . In a statement on Wednesday , DT National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases , which is conducting DT NN , VBD preliminary data show patients who received remdesivir recovered faster than similar patients who received placebo . DT finding — although difficult to fully characterize without full , detailed data for DT NN — MD represent DT first treatment shown to improve outcomes in patients infected with DT NN WDT put DT JJ economy in a standstill and killed at least 218,000 NNS worldwide . During an appearance alongside NNP NNP in DT Oval Office , Anthony Fauci , DT director of NIAID , part of DT National Institutes of NNP , VBD DT data are a “ very important proof of concept ” and IN EX was reason for optimism . He cautioned DT data were not a “ knockout . ” At DT same NN , DT NN achieved its primary goal , which was to improve DT NN to recovery , which was reduced by four days for patients on remdesivir . DT preliminary data showed IN DT NN to recovery was 11 days on remdesivir compared to 15 days for placebo , a 31 % decrease . DT mortality rate for DT remdesivir group was 8 % , compared to 11.6 % for DT placebo group ; DT mortality difference was not statistically significant . DT is “ DT first convincing evidence IN an antiviral drug can really benefit NNP - CD patients , specifically hospitalized NNP - CD patients , ” VBD Frederick Hayden , a professor emeritus of clinical virology and medicine at DT University of Virginia School of Medicine . “ This will VB DT standard of care in DT NNP NNPS and other NNS for DT patients who have been shown to be benefited , ” he VBD , adding IN determining DT exact group WDT should receive DT drug will require further examination of DT data . Over DT past few weeks , EX have been conflicting reports about DT potential benefit of remdesivir , a drug WDT was previously tried in Ebola . As previously reported by STAT , an early peek at Gilead ’s NN in severe NNP - CD patients , based on data from a trial at a Chicago hospital , suggested patients were doing better than expected on remdesivir . Days later , a summary of results from a NN in NNP showed IN patients on DT drug did not improve more than those in a control group . Full results from DT NNP NN were RB released Wednesday . But DT NIAID NN , which was not expected to be released so soon , was by far DT most important and rigorously designed test of remdesivir in NNP - CD . DT NN compared remdesivir to placebo in 800 patients , with neither patients nor physicians knowing who got DT drug instead of a placebo , meaning IN unconscious biases will not affect DT conclusions . DT main goal of DT NN is DT NN until patients improve , with different measures of improvement depending on how sick PRP were to begin with . While DT result means IN DT drug helps patients improve faster , PRP is not possible to say how dramatic those improvements are . Scott Gottlieb , DT former commissioner of DT Food and Drug Administration , VBD he expected EX was enough evidence for DT agency to issue an “ emergency use authorization ” for remdesivir . “ Remdesivir is n’t a home run but looks active and can be part of a toolbox of drugs and diagnostics WDT substantially lower our risk heading into DT fall , ” he VBD . Aneesh Mehta , a physician at Emory University and an investigator in DT NIAID NN , VBD DT results were “ robust enough ” to report preliminary findings , but a full analysis of all DT data will be required to fully understand DT drug ’s effect . DT NN to recovery seen in DT final analysis “ MD be shorter , PRP MD be longer . PRP do n’t VB yet . ” Mehta RB expects DT final results to do some analyses on which patients might benefit most from remdesivir . DT FDA previously issued an emergency authorization for DT malaria drug hydroxychloroquine to treat NNP - CD , even though at least some studies suggested DT medicine was not effective . “ If hydroxychloroquine met [ DT emergency ] standard , then remdesivir MD have seemed to cross DT line a while ago , especially in DT setting of treating critically ill patients , ” Gottlieb VBD . Remdesivir , which must be given intravenously , is likely to remain a treatment for patients who are hospitalized . But PRP is RB likely IN PRP will be most effective in patients who have been infected more recently , VBD Nahid Bhadelia , JJ director of DT special pathogens unit at Boston NNP Center . “ PRP VBP IN with most antiviral medications DT earlier PRP give PRP DT better PRP is . ” VBD Bhadelia , who had experience giving remdesivir as an experimental treatment for Ebola in Africa , where results are less encouraging . DT means IN better diagnostic testing will be essential to identifying patients who MD benefit . “ What will be important is IN PRP find NNS on DT outpatient side , ” Bhadelia VBD . “ Again , testing becomes important , PRP VBP to have them come to DT hospital as soon as possible . ” Although DT data have not yet been released , PRP ’s standard procedure for pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies to release market - moving information as soon as PRP have PRP , due to regulatory requirements . Gilead on Wednesday did release data from its own NN of remdesivir in patients with severe NNP - CD . This NN showed similar rates of clinical improvement in patients treated with a five - day and 10 - day course of remdesivir , DT company VBD . “ Unlike traditional drug development , PRP are attempting to evaluate an investigational agent alongside an evolving JJ pandemic . Multiple concurrent studies are helping inform whether remdesivir is a safe and effective treatment for NN - CD and how to best utilize DT drug , ” VBD Merdad Parsey , Gilead ’s chief JJ officer , in a statement . Gilead VBD IN its own NN in severe patients showed IN PRP MD be possible to treat patients with a five - day treatment of remdesivir , not DT 10 - day course WDT was used in DT NIAID trial . DT company ’s NN is enrolling approximately 6,000 participants from 152 different clinical trial sites all over DT NN . DT data disclosed Wednesday are from 397 patients , with a statistical comparison of patient improvement between DT two remdesivir treatment arms — DT five - day and 10 - day treatment courses . Improvement was measured using a seven - point numerical scale WDT encompasses death ( at worst ) and discharge from hospital ( best outcome ) , with various degrees of supplemental oxygen and intubation in between . DT NN design means IN by itself PRP does n’t reveal much about how well remdesivir is working , because EX is no group of patients who were untreated . DT conclusion is IN DT two durations of treatment are basically DT same . Peter Bach , DT director of DT Center for NNP Policy and Outcomes at Memorial Sloan Kettering NNP Center , VBD he is eager to see DT data from DT NIAID NN but renewed his criticism of Gilead ’s severe NN for lacking a control group of untreated patients . DT MD have allowed researchers to make important conclusions about how DT drug works WDT are just not possible now , he VBD . “ PRP ’ve squandered an unbelievable opportunity , ” Bach VBD . “ PRP ’s not VBG to tell PRP what to do with 80 - NN - olds with multiple comorbidities compared to 30 - NN - olds who are otherwise healthy . PRP ’re still VBG to be foundering around in DT dark , or at least in a dim room , when PRP MD have learned more . ” In DT NN , DT median NN to clinical improvement was 10 days in DT five - day treatment group and 11 days in DT 10 - day treatment group . At day 14 , 64.5 % of DT patients in DT five - day group and 53.8 % of DT patients in DT 10 - day group achieved clinical recovery . Those mortality rates are lower than those seen in other studies , which have been in DT teens and twenties . At DT median , remdesivir - treated patients improved in 20 days compared to 23 days for placebo patients . At CD month , 14 % of DT remdesivir patients had died compared to 13 % of DT placebo - treated patients . DT NNP NN enrolled patients with more severe NN - CD than DT NN conducted by NIAID . DT NNP NN was RB stopped early because of difficulties enrolling patients as DT pandemic waned in NNP . Hayden , DT University of Virginia virologist , was CD of DT investigators in DT NNP NN and pointed to DT similarity of DT results . He VBD IN while DT NIAID investigators had been able to enroll enough patients , DT decrease in NNS in Wuhan due to DT lockdown had made DT impossible . “ I was struck by DT consistency , ” he VBD .

DT Mesopotamians refined this process around 800 B.C. , using two flat , circular stones , stacked on top CD another to grind DT grain . DT desire for DT whitest , most refined bread continued through DT modern era , and later advancements included DT sifting of flour to remove DT bran and DT germ and DT bleaching of DT flour itself . 3. Mechanized Slicing . For hundreds of NNS , DT finest white breads were sold in whole loaves to be cut at home — IN a French baguette . text: DT “ body hacking ” movement is about implanting into DT human body technology such as RFID chips , cameras and even LED lights . By bypassing NN and ethical issues associated transhumanism , this body hacking pushes this movement to strange JJ frontiers . As stated in my previous articles about DT subject , transhumanism has been heavily promoted in mass NN in DT past NNS , whether PRP be through movies , music videos , video games and documentaries . Often , DT word “ transhumanism ” is n’t even used . Instead , PRP simply show how a robotic enhancement “ upgrades ” DT human body and makes PRP cooler , effectively selling DT idea to NNS who believe PRP are being entertained – especially young NNS . A by - product of this trend is “ body hacking ” , a movement WDT forgoes DT ethical and philosophical questions associated with transhumanism to VB right into drilling robotic parts onto PRP ’s body . While JJ of PRP dread DT day when microchips implants will be a requirement in a dystopian society , some NNS actually pay to have PRP done to them . Here ’s an interesting article about DT movement from NPR . A curious crowd lingered around Amal Graafstra as he carefully unpacked a pair of gloves , a small sterile blanket and a huge needle . A long line of NNS were waiting to VB tiny computer chips implanted into their hands . Graafstra had set up shop in a booth in DT middle of an exhibit hall at DT Austin Convention Center in Texas ’ capital , where he gathered last month with several hundred others who call themselves “ body hackers ” — NNS who push DT boundaries of implantable technology to improve DT human body . DT movement evokes visceral reactions , brings up safety and ethical concerns and quickly veers into sci- fi questions about DT line between human and cyborg . Graafstra is a pioneer in DT space . Using his own body to experiment , he designed bio -safe magnets and DT microchip he was about to implant into DT hand of A.J. Butt , who was sporting a tall , blue mohawk . DT implantable RFID chips hold encrypted information , and their unique ID numbers can be used to open doors or unlock DT owner ’s smartphone , which is what Butt wanted to do . Butt took a deep breath . DT needle plunged into his skin at DT base of his thumb , and a chip bigger than a grain of rice slipped just below DT surface . Across DT way , Sasha Rose , who was working a meditation booth at DT convention , watched DT NNS line up to be “ chipped . ” She shook her head : This was DT craziest thing she had seen . She wondered about Graafstra ’s credentials . She thought this was a JJ procedure , so should he be performing PRP ? Did his clients VB DT potential consequences of carrying personal information on a device inside their skin ? “ More than DT crazy concept , PRP ’s actually NNS ’s willingness to accept PRP . DT ’s why PRP ’s crazy to me , ” Rose VBD . “ NNS are just willing to just line up and VB , ‘ Yeah , stick DT in me . ’ ” At night , JJ of DT convention - goers gathered at a club on Austin ’s Sixth Street . Graafstra was outside with Ryan O’Shea , whose company Grindhouse Wetware made DT Internet squirm earlier this NN when PRP released a close - up surgery video of CD of its implants called Northstar . In PRP , a man gets a small incision in his hand , and then , with a metallic tool dipped into PRP , DT skin is lifted to produce a cavity where a round subdermal implant with five LED lights is placed . DT result looks dystopian — DT incision is stitched with black thread , and LED lights make DT skin on DT hand glow red . But body hackers view DT NN differently , Graafstra VBD . PRP believe technology has reached a point where PRP can improve DT human body instead of just fixing what ’s broken . “ A patient MD someday come very soon and say , ‘ My eye is totally fine , but I VBP an eye WDT can see infrared . And I VBP an eye WDT can zoom , ’ ” Graafstra VBD . DT kind of future — where DT human body is augmented by technology — is DT goal of JJ of these experiments . O’Shea VBD Grindhouse Wetware is using its LED device to test how long a device IN PRP can remain charged inside a body , and Graafstra VBD his RFID chip is a small attempt at merging digital identity with physical identity . “ I VBP once NNS realize , ‘ Oh , PRP ’s OK IN my grandma has a pacemaker ’ … NNS are VBG to start to accept this , ” O ’Shea VBD . “ PRP VBP , DT era of transhumanism , I MD say , is here . So let ’s accept DT and then see where DT logically takes PRP . ” Inside DT club , a drone hovered above DT dance floor . DT polished steel and DT electronic dance music gave PRP a futuristic feel . Standing near DT bar was Tony Salvador , who studies social values and how PRP affect technology at Intel . He was at DT conference to VB a feel of when and if “ body hacking ” MD be accepted into DT mainstream . Sometimes , he VBD , technology moves too fast and outpaces accepted social boundaries — not to mention laws . He argued DT was part of DT reason why early wearers of Google Glass were called “ glassholes . ” “ PRP created a social misunderstanding , ” Salvador VBD . “ PRP did n’t VB what was VBG on . ” To Salvador , DT boundaries of acceptance are a matter of our social philosophy , an area WDT he argued was driven by esoteric discourse without tangible moral and ethical recommendations . DT philosophers , he VBD , are letting PRP down . Alva Noë , a philosopher at DT University of California , Berkeley and a contributor to NPR ’s 13.7 : Cosmos and Culture blog , has written extensively on what he calls “ cyborgian naturalness . ” He disagreed IN DT modern philosophers dropped DT ball , saying IN tackling DT matter MD involve unpacking two questions : • Is PRP OK to cut into human bodies for these kinds of experiments ? • How much tolerance should society have for artificially enhancing DT body ? To DT first question , Noë VBD he found DT “ body hacking ” experimentation on humans “ ethically disturbing ” and MD n’t fathom a doctor or any other NNS conducting these kinds of operations . DT second question was more complicated . “ PRP do n’t condemn NNS for using glasses to see better , ” he VBD . “ But PRP do start to VB taking speed to cope with your work life is questionable . ” Because those kinds of judgments are an ethical question , drawing a tolerance line MD always be a moving target , he VBD . “ PRP MD reach consensuses and then lose them , ” Noë VBD . “ Just as EX was once a consensus where PRP was OK to smoke to function effectively , and now PRP have DT consensus IN , increasingly , PRP ’s not OK to do DT . ” If EX ’s a rock star in DT body - hacking movement , PRP ’s Neil Harbisson , a colorblind artist from Barcelona who persuaded a doctor to implant a camera in DT back of his head . DT antenna , as he calls PRP , essentially lets Harbisson listen to colors by detecting DT dominant color in front of him and translating PRP into musical notes . DT way he tells PRP , a JJ ethics committee in Europe had refused to sign off on DT operation , but a doctor agreed to perform DT surgery anonymously . From PRP , Harbisson emerged with a camera connected to a device on DT back of his skull , its lens dangling in front of his face on a rod WDT arcs over his head . As he walked DT streets of Austin , he described how he perceived DT NN : DT red traffic light sounded IN an A note ; DT green grass sounded IN an F . In his keynote address at DT conference , Harbisson VBD DT first NN he heard those colors in his sleep , he felt truly cyborg . Now , he no longer identifies as human but as a “ cybernetic organism . ” “ If PRP define ourselves as organisms , suddenly our group is wider , ” he VBD . “ PRP are on DT same level as an insect , or as a cat , or as a plant . ” Harbisson is well aware of how DT NN perceives him . He moved from Barcelona to NNP York City in search of “ peace ” with another friend in DT transhumanist movement , Moon Ribas . Ribas has an electronic device in her arm WDT she VBD vibrates when EX is an earthquake anywhere in DT NN . On more than CD occasion , NNS have tried to rip off his antenna , Harbisson VBD . DT ’s part of DT reason why he co-founded DT Cyborg Foundation to advocate for “ cyborg rights . ” When asked if he ’s ever thought about just taking DT antenna off , Harbisson demurred . “ To me , PRP ’s much stronger , DT wish to sense what ’s around me , than DT fact IN NNS keep annoying me , ” he VBD , adding IN maybe , in DT future , as others VBP JJ senses , he ’ll be considered normal .

text: " PRP [ penguins ] are charismatic , endearing and in serious trouble , " warned NBC ’s Anne Thompson on DT Dec. 12 , 2007 , " Nightly NNP . " Thompson did n’t include any disagreement . DT ’s four more dissenting NNS than CBS put on its network in six entire months . To better assess network behavior on this key topic , DT Business & NNP Institute examined 205 stories from ABC , CBS and NBC WDT mentioned " JJ NN " or " NN NN " between July 1 , 2007 , and Dec. 31 , 2007 . BMI found skepticism was shut out of a vast majority of reports . Overall , a measly 20 percent had any dissent at all referenced by a journalist or guest . CD person skeptical of manmade NN NN , a Kentucky NN representative , managed to VB on DT air but was treated to an exceptionally hostile interview by ABC ’s Bill Weir . But according to Dr. Pat Michaels viewers MD be better served by hearing both sides . “ PRP MD benefit from appreciating DT true scientific diversity on DT topic . DT arguments against these gloom and doom JJ NN scenarios are much stronger than DT arguments for them , ” Michaels told BMI . According to NBC ’s Brian Williams , “ EX ’s no shortage of folks out RB saying PRP ’s [ JJ NN is ] not all RB bad . ” Williams was teasing a “ Nightly NNP ” story on August 15 WDT included two other voices : Dr. Pat Michaels , a research professor of environmental sciences , and Marlo Lewis , senior fellow at DT Competitive Enterprise Institute . Williams was certainly right – EX are hundreds of NNS from around DT NN who question DT JJ NN “ consensus ” – but in DT NN DT latter half of 2007 PRP had to look hard to find them . On DT three networks , 80 percent of stories ( 167 out of 205 ) did n’t mention skepticism or anyone at all who dissented from JJ NN alarmism . CBS did DT absolute worst job . Ninety - seven percent of its stories ( 34 out of 35 ) ignored other opinions . Williams ’ own network , NBC , came in a close second with 85 percent ( 76 out of 89 ) excluding skepticism . ABC was DT most balanced network , but still censored dissent from 64 percent of its stories ( 34 out of 53 ) . But dissent flourishes . DT U.S. Senate Environment and NNP Works ( EPW ) Committee released a list on Dec. 20 , 2007 , of more than 400 skeptical NNS from different fields – astrophysics , geology , climatology , meteorology and others . DT release did n’t even earn a NN brief from CD of DT three networks as of Dec. 31 , 2007 . Even when CD show claimed PRP MD represent a range of opinions on DT issue , PRP did n’t . On Oct. 30 , 2007 , NBC “ Today ” co-host Matt Lauer teased DT upcoming “ Ends of DT NNP ” broadcasts saying to Meredith Vieira , “ And PRP ’re VBG to be interviewing all DT experts talking about DT issues of NN NN . ” ( emphasis added ) Vieira replied , “ Absolutely . text: A rapper - turned - flat - Earther is attempting to prove IN DT NN is not round by crowdfunding his own satellite launch . B.o.B , born Bobby Ray Simmons Jr. , is a rapper from Georgia who once recorded a diss track about physicist Neil deGrasse Tyson , after DT two got into a Twitter fight in 2016 about whether DT NNP is round . DT rapper is a member of DT Flat NNP Society , a group of NNS who are convinced IN DT NN is flat , not round . A scroll through B.o. B's Twitter feed RB reveals a number of other NN beliefs : He is an anti-vaxxer , a 9/11 truther and RB , for some reason , believes IN oil does not form from DT remains of organic material buried under pressure . B.o.B's JJ GoFundMe has a $ 1 million goal and has raised $ 2,701 from 98 NNS in DT five days since he put up DT request . ( He pledged DT first $ 1,000 himself . ) DT goal , according to DT rapper , is to launch a satellite as far into space as necessary to " find DT curve " of NNP . [ 7 Ways to Prove DT NNP Is Round ( Without Launching a Satellite ) ] How PRP VBP DT NNP is round Despite myths about Christopher Columbus believing he might sail off DT edge of DT NNP , humans have known IN DT NN is round for a very , very long NN . DT Greek philosopher and mathematician Pythagoras left DT first written arguments for a round NNP in 500 B.C. Ancient Greeks thought DT sphere was DT perfect shape , so PRP stood to reason , Pythagoras figured , IN DT NNP was spherical . A few hundred NNS later , according to DT American Physical Society ( APS ) , Aristotle dropped some scientific evidence into DT debate . He pointed out IN during lunar eclipses , NNP 's shadow on DT moon is curved ; ships VBG over DT horizon seem to drop down , hull - first , rather than becoming tinier and tinier until PRP disappear ; and different stars are visible from different vantage points on NNP , which MD n't make much sense if DT NN were flat . DT Greek mathematician Eratosthenes , born in 276 B.C. , even managed to determine DT circumference of DT NNP . He did this , according to DT APS , by measuring DT angle of DT shadow of a stick stuck in DT ground on DT summer solstice in Alexandria , on what is today DT Egyptian coast . He knew IN in Aswan , Egypt ( then known as Syene ) , DT sun cast no shadows on DT day of DT solstice — PRP was directly overhead . DT difference in DT sun 's angle between Syene and Alexandria corresponded to CD - fiftieth of a complete circle , so Eratosthenes realized IN if he knew DT exact distance between DT two cities , he 'd just need to multiply to determine DT full circumference of DT NNP . DT mathematician had to hire surveyors to walk DT distance with precisely measured steps , but he eventually landed on a total circumference for DT NN of between 24,000 and 29,000 miles ( 39,000 to 47,000 kilometers ) . He turned out to be remarkably accurate : Around DT equator , DT NN 's circumference is 24,900 miles ( 40,072 km ) . So if DT ancient Greeks had PRP figured out , how can anyone still believe in a flat NNP in DT age of satellites and rocket launches ? [ Top 10 NN Theories ] DT resurgence of flat - NNP beliefs started in DT early 1800s with a writer named Samuel Rowbotham , who developed an entire alternative cosmology around DT idea IN DT NNP is a flat plane enclosed by a dome of space , surrounded by a perimeter of NN walls . Rowbotham 's philosophy was IN DT NNP looks flat , from a human 's point of view walking on DT surface , so everyone who VBD PRP MD show otherwise must be lying . DT International Flat NNP Society , formed in 1956 , draws from Rowbotham 's views . In DT mid-1990s , DT NN of DT group claimed to have 3,500 paying members , according to his NNP York Times obituary . Today , DT Flat NNP Society website claims to have 555 members , DT most recent being B.o.B . Flat - Earthers do n't trust NASA or any other space agency . According to DT Flat NNP Society 's FAQs , astronauts are being bribed or coerced into lying ; airplane windows distort views to make PRP look IN DT horizon curves ; and DT International Space Station is a hoax . RB , gravity is n't real . An independent satellite launch MD or MD not convince B.o. B IN DT NNP really does curve , but he MD find DT process a bit difficult if he does n't accept IN DT NN is round . text: NNS who belief in DT Flat NNP Theory hold DT conviction IN DT NN is flat and not round . This theory started to become more and more popular around 2009 and is growing ever since . PRP is considered CD of DT most controversial NN theories existing . PRP claim DT NNP to be flat because for them PRP feels IN and looks IN PRP is . DT ones believing in this Theory call themself “ DT Flat NNP Society ” and DT importance about this is IN even though EX is evidence to DT contrary PRP claim those “ to be fabrications of a ‘ round NNP NN ’ ” ( Wolchover ) . DT believers in DT Flat NNP Theory VBP IN DT “ NNP is a disc with DT Arctic Circle in DT center and Antarctica , a 150 - foot - tall wall of NN , around DT rim . ” ( Wolchover ) . Believers claim IN DT NASA guards protect those NN walls from NNS WDT try to climb over and fall from DT disc . In their eyes PRP RB believe IN NNP ’s gravity is an illusion and objects do not accelerate downward , PRP are “ driven up by a mysterious force called dark NN ” . On DT opposite end , EX are countless photographs , videos , and imagery from astronauts and from DT International Space Station WDT is enough evidence to show IN DT NNP is actually round , but DT interesting part here is IN even though EX is evidence WDT prove their claims wrong in their eyes PRP is not considered real evidence and faked by DT NN . Those who believe in PRP most likely misinterpret DT evidence and are only looking for beliefs WDT MD confirm their owns . This is RB called confirmation bias . In this case PRP ignore DT real evidence IN DT NN is round and label them as ‘ fake ’ , whereas when something in any way MD support their beliefs has to be correct . Another cognitive contribution is groupthink , which is a concept WDT NNS within a group “ value harmony and coherence above rational thinking ” ( PsychologyToday ) . This often results in dysfunctional outcomes and irrational beliefs . In this case , Flat NNP Society members do not VB to doubt or judge DT others beliefs and therefore strengthen their owns . DT flat NNP model started in DT ancient where JJ cultures believed in a flat NNP “ until DT classical DT Bronze Age ” ( Wikipedia ) . PRP became more controversial again , because DT moon landing in 1959 came with a lot of skepticism . Flat NN theorists believe IN DT moon landing was fake and DT pictures and audios recorded from DT NN were fabrications . PRP believe IN GPS devices and maps are fake and IN DT International Space Station is a fake space station , believing PRP MD be cheaper to promote a fake station rather than build a real NN . DT primary social influence WDT maintains their belief is groupthink . Social reinforcement form IN - minded NNS allows them to feel sane when PRP speak of DT topic and feel IN their opinions are respected and justified . Even though this theory can be proven wrong by a lot of evidence , DT human brain and different psychological concept show how PRP can persists with their beliefs due to groupthink or biases . Human RB love searching for meaning and drawing connections between things WDT sometimes have no tangible connection between them . PRP is simply human nature .

text: With every interesting celestial event these days , Christian prophecy theorists take to YouTube to share their speculation on why it's a " sign " and what PRP might just mean . But does God really communicate warnings this way in DT sun , moon and stars ? Does DT Bible really instruct PRP to look for " signs " in DT heavens ? What are PRP to " watch " for according to Jesus ? As PRP will learn , theorists ( unintentionally ) deceive themselves and others when PRP do n't properly define and use DT word " sign " DT same way DT Bible does . VB Scriptural answers to these important questions , ones WDT PRP wo n't find on YouTube no matter how JJ " views " a video has ... Since DT Christian speculation over DT " four blood moons " lunar eclipses of 2014 - 2015 failed and neither DT Great Tribulation nor DT Rapture happened as predicted , PRP 're still here . DT means now PRP VBP to discuss similar speculation about DT latest solar eclipse or celestial event . Are PRP ready ? Once again , PRP 's all thanks to YouTube ... Yes , DT same wonderful YouTube WDT brings PRP : • any song or music video from your childhood PRP VBP to experience again , • instructional videos to fix anything and everything in your life , ... RB brings PRP theories WDT either were dismissed with DT arrival of NNP or WDT are too obviously contrived to ever spread through other channels WDT cost money or by free channels WDT are limited to much - less - persuasive text ( IN DT original Web 1.0 ) . Why do PRP VB flat NNP theory is in a resurgence ? ( No , NASA did not develop a NN machine and bring back medieval NNS and teach them to blog . ) PRP 's because free video allows any " thought " ( using DT term loosely ) to VB bolstered up by convincing charts , photos and DT silver tongues of persuasive on - screen personalities . Flat - earther Christians began emailing me in early 2015 right after a now popular YouTube video on DT topic was posted : • 2015 , first flat - earther to write me : " I have n't seen PRP write about DT E yet , which by DT way , fits way better with bible teachings . " • 2016 , same person after writing a flat NNP article for him : " Please cancel ALL emails to me . PRP are a and obviously have spent no NN on researching DT flat NNP . " Likewise , because of YouTube , prophetic speculation is spreading about DT latest interesting eclipse . PRP 's even popular enough to break into mainstream NN just IN DT 2014 - 2015 speculation did . I say " interesting " eclipse because EX are several eclipses ( lunar or solar ) every NN WDT are simply ignored by our helpful YouTube " watchmen . " Unless a celestial event has something extra ( IN taking place on Jewish holy days or happening seven NNS away from something else interesting ) then PRP wo n't see a prophecy video on PRP . Eclipses are far too common to form DT basis of a prophecy theory every single NN PRP happen . But DT 2017 solar eclipse is an interesting NN . Here are some of DT factoids talked about this eclipse — along with my responses to help PRP VB about them more critically yourself : • Claim : " DT next total solar eclipse in America is in seven NNS and forms an X when combined with this eclipse . These eclipses MD be marking out DT seven NN Tribulation ! " Response : Where does DT Bible say to look for eclipses to mark DT Tribulation ? Nowhere . What does PRP tell PRP to expect first ? Jesus already VBD , " when PRP see DT Abomination of Desolation " DT Great Tribulation is next ( Mt 24:15 ) . Further , DT seven - NN - long 70th Week of Daniel cannot start this NN as numerous prerequisites have not happened , IN DT Nuclear Middle East War , Elijah 's coming , and most importantly DT Good NNP of DT Kingdom returning ( Mt 24:14 ) ( more on DT below ) . • Claim : " DT solar eclipse happens DT day before DT start of DT Hebrew month of Elul . " Response : " Day before " is kind of random and arbitrary . MD n't DT eclipse need to happen on Elul 1 itself if PRP VBP to connect PRP to DT past historical prophetic events of DT day ? DT 's what was done in 2014 - 2015 with eclipses on DT very days of Passover and Sukkot by Mark Biltz . This NN Mr. Biltz is happy enough with " DT day before " to make a connection . This is a logical fallacy called " moving DT goal posts . " • Claim : " Jonah left for Nineveh on DT day of Elul 1 after EX was a major solar eclipse in Nineveh DT month before . " Response : See above IN DT eclipse is not on DT day of Elul 1 , so to be consistent , PRP must throw out any connection to Elul . As for " DT month before " claim ( generously granting IN DT dating of this ancient event is reliable ) , why MD DT Ninevites connect Jonah 's arrival with an eclipse an entire month before ? To reasonably expect NNS to connect an eclipse to something , IN something needs to happen at DT same NN , such as right as Jonah arrived and started warning . Again , moving goal posts . ( For a great depiction of something IN this , see Mel Gibson 's movie Apocalypto and how a solar eclipse causes DT pagans to VB plans immediately . ) • Claim : " DT solar eclipse is 40 days from Yom Kippur " Response : Actually , PRP 's 41 days before Yom Kippur because PRP comes DT day before Elul 1 which itself always starts DT " 40 days of awe / repentance " before Yom Kippur , yes ? But even if PRP was 40 days , so what ? Elul 1 comes every NN without event . Eclipses come every NN without event . Nothing in Scripture connects general eclipses with prophecy . • Claim : " NNP War 1 started in August , 1914 DT same month EX was a total solar eclipse over DT Ottoman Empire ( E. Europe ) which ended with WW1 . " Response : Why is " same month " significant ? As stated above , PRP 's tenuous at best to connect an eclipse to any event WDT is not concurrent . Further , EX have been half a dozen total solar eclipses in Europe since WW1 , so why have PRP not had WW3 - WW7 already ? Because this WW1 eclipse claim comes from another logical fallacy called cherry - picking data . • Claim : " DT last NN an eclipse crossed only DT NNP NNPS was during WW1 on August 21 , 1914 " Response : I guess DT implication here is IN " trouble " is coming again this NN ? If this is how PRP works based on WW1 , what happened to DT total solar eclipse across DT continent before WW2 ?? I guess EX 's not much of a pattern here when PRP include all DT data but instead just draw a circle around DT data WDT fits your theory , RB called DT Texas Sharpshooter fallacy . • Claim : " DT path of DT solar eclipse passes over counties WDT 95 % voted for NNP " Response : What , PRP mean God is using DT Sun to highlight his approval of NNP ? Albeit only 95 % approval ... haha . I thought he was DT Messiah , er , Cyrus LOL . ( I am not against NNP per se , just some NNS take their adoration of him too far , in my opinion . ) • Claim : " DT path of DT solar eclipse passes over SEVEN towns called Salem ! " Response : What , PRP mean God is using DT Sun to highlight his approval of NNP ? Albeit only 95 % approval ... haha . I thought he was DT Messiah , EX are JJ , JJ more claims than this about DT eclipse because , just IN with DT 2012 Mayan Calendar speculation , as more NNS hear DT idea , PRP perceive more connections of their own WDT spawn more YouTube videos . DT above most frequently repeated claims are enough to see how arbitrary and subjective DT " evidence " is for this eclipse being prophetically significant . Q : " What are DT odds ? PRP ca n't be just a coincidence ! " A : No PRP 's not a coincidence but DT odds are not as great as PRP VBP when PRP understand what PRP really is ! As DT section above illustrated , DT " connections " WDT are made to support DT " significance " of DT eclipse or other event use inconsistent rules . In other words , PRP use inconsistent rules and logic to connect whatever PRP can remember or imagine or Google WDT MD impress NNS . • If DT event falls same day as a Biblical holy day ... bingo ! • If PRP comes DT day before a biblical date ... close enough , bingo ! • If PRP comes DT same month as something else big ... bingo ! • If PRP comes seven NNS before something ... bingo ! Obviously , when PRP employ flexible , moving goalposts or " rules " IN this , PRP are able to find interesting factoids for any event or date PRP believe is significant . This is what happened with DT 2012 Mayan Calendar date , and DT 2014 - 2015 Four Blood Moons theory and PRP VBP how these turned out despite DT claim , " DT odds of all these connections are astronomical ! This happens not because of legitimate coincides but rather due to a human psychological bias called Confirmation Bias . This bias causes PRP to ignore or reject evidence against our theory and accept and report all DT evidence for PRP . Even when NNS present evidence against our theory ( IN this article ! ) their bias will use flexible rules and other moving goalposts to reject DT evidence against PRP . For example , here 's another claim about DT 2017 total solar eclipse regarding DT name Salem : Seven towns named Salem . So what , right ? But wait , PRP found a verse to tie PRP to DT eclipse . Drum roll again , please ... Look at DT , will PRP , DT word Salem is last part of DT word Jerusalem and it's connected to an eclipse ! " What are DT odds ? " DT odds are very high indeed when PRP can " cheat " by matching any aspect of an eclipse to any part of any word in DT Bible even remotely related to an eclipse . Contrivances IN this only demonstrate DT imagination and research genius of DT prophecy theorist to justify their event as important . PRP do n't provide any real Biblical proof IN DT event is prophetically significant . By DT way , real Biblical evidence for an event 's prophetic significance MD be along DT lines of a direct quote from Jesus . IN him saying , " When PRP see X , then DT end shall come . " Turns out Jesus VBD something exactly IN DT , but not about an eclipse ! ( More below . ) Prophecy theories IN this are not just based on specific claims about a particular eclipse or other celestial event . DT theorists RB quote numerous Biblical passages to justify their unusual focus on heavenly events in DT first place . ( Again , see DT film Apocalypto for a reminder of how DT pagans viewed eclipses . PRP MD say Christians fearing eclipses again today is " retro " but in a negative way , much IN flat NNP theory is retro . P.S. No judgment on DT NNS , just DT ideas PRP believe and , too often , beat other believers up over . ) For an example of DT " heavenly " focus verses PRP employ , look at this partial transcription of a " biblical astronomy " YouTube video and see if PRP can spot any problems with DT reasoning before I point them out : Sounds reasonable , does n't PRP ? At least to most JJ to prophecy NN . PRP 's persuasive enough for JJ of them to hit DT share button and send PRP to others to help warn them or ask their opinion . ( I VBP for me I only ever watch a prophecy teaching on YouTube because someone shared PRP to ask my opinion of PRP . ) DT transcript above leads to a false conclusion to justify looking to DT heavens for God 's direction such as with eclipses . Here 's DT problems with DT arguments above : • Psalm CD tells PRP DT heavens declare something , and it's a pretty broad concept at DT : " God 's glory . " PRP uses a lot of poetic language ( IN anthropomorphism ) to emphasize this . But EX is no literal speech or language or communication on DT level from DT sky . EX is enough expanse RB for humanity to realize God exists and to be " without excuse " in denying this fact and disobeying him as Paul VBD ( Rom 1:20 ) . DT 's PRP for DT normal , daily basis IN DT psalm is commenting on ( with two rare exceptions , see 3 below ) . • Because of this , DT heavens cannot ever serve as a way for God to " speak " intelligibly to his NNS . For nearly all of PRP , space is just a random bunch of balls of light with different names , sizes and illumination levels . A few of these balls have vague or general historical meanings IN DT Signs of DT Zodiac do . What PRP means when PRP light up or crisscross is anybody 's guess , and guess away PRP do ! This is why EX are a million and CD subjective opinions on " what DT eclipse means " shared by prophecy theorists . • DT Bible already answers DT question posed on how God has and will speak " to all his NNS " when DT need comes to do DT : through his end NN prophet Elijah and lastly through seven literal thundering shouts of his voice ( Ps 29:3 = Rev 10:4 ) right before he brings his Kingdom to NNP at DT 7th trumpet ( Rev 11:15 ) . Oh , God can speak to all his NNS at once with clear , human language when he wants to . He did this with all of ancient Israel at Mount Sinai and PRP consequently asked him to " please , stop " out of fear ( Ex 20:19 ) . As PRP can tell , apart from God 's greatness , DT heavens do not communicate much at all very clearly to PRP humans . This is why God uses several other much better means to talk to humanity . As noted above , all these means use actual , real , human language . If God spoke in a way any less clear than DT , no NN MD be held accountable to act on his instructions or warnings . PRP MD rightly claim PRP did not understand because his " heavenly lights language " was incomprehensible . But what about all those " sign " verses ? Does n't sign mean a message as with a " For Sale " " sign ? " Does n't God use DT lights in DT heavens to at least send simple informational warnings of end times events ? Not quite . Let 's look at DT common verses WDT are used to justify drawing attention to eclipses and other heavenly displays . DT thrust of Genesis 1:14 is IN DT heavenly lights MD signal common divisions of NN : " seasons , days and NNS . " In DT Bible , DT month is based on DT moon ; months begin with DT JJ ( crescent ) moon . Days begin when DT sun sets or disappears . Stars in DT sky VBP based on DT season PRP are in . NNS RB can be marked by DT solstices , or shortest or longest days of DT NN . DT 's what Genesis in context means by letting them be all things dealing with DT calendar . PRP says nothing about " let them be for prophetic warning signs from God " IN prophecy theorists wrongly wield ( proof - text ) DT verse to mean . In both of these passages DT word for sign MD RB be translated as " miracle , " " token " or " wonder . " Notice IN none of those words convey DT idea of " communication / speech / warning " as is portrayed by prophecy theorists . DT point of DT word is IN EX is a attention - catching display in DT sky . PRP 's called a " wonder " because PRP makes NNS " wonder " due to PRP being unclear and hard to explain . Further , if PRP read Luke 21:25 in context , PRP do not find instructions to look for this sign to mean anything . PRP comes at DT end of God 's wrath , right before DT Jesus appears . PRP 's certainly proper to have a nice heavenly fanfare before his triumphant return . By then PRP 'll already VB DT day he 's coming . Revelation 12 goes on to explain DT meaning of DT great signs of DT Woman and DT Dragon . DT Dragon is DT constellation Draco and RB Satan . DT Woman RB works at JJ levels including DT constellation Virgo , Mary and saints of Israel and of DT Church . PRP shows plainly IN DT Woman gives birth to DT Messiah who later is " taken up " to heaven ( Acts 1:9 = Rev 12:5 ) . EX is no connection in any way given between DT Woman in heaven and DT end times events . Later after she is found on DT NN fleeing from DT Dragon , she is indeed an end NN character , too . DT sign in DT sky she portrayed earlier is never connected to her end NN actions and existence . When NNS make such a connection PRP read into DT text what is not RB , ignoring what is RB as PRP did connecting September 23 , 2017 with Revelation 12 . As DT previous section explained , when PRP look at DT " signs " verses in context , PRP do not support DT meaning for which PRP are used by Christian prophecy inventors . Each verse refers to a specific instance and application , such as calendar signs and DT DT sign on DT day Jesus returns . PRP are not meant to give " carte blanche " or a blank check to justify " scanning DT heavens for any sign " IN Christian theorists do . All DT was obvious to me long ago and I have written on PRP before . Thinking deeper on this topic , I began I see another problem . DT meaning of DT word translated " sign " in our English Bible versions does not support DT definition WDT prophecy theorists use PRP for . Sign , IN JJ words , has several valid , possible literal meanings and connotations . A sign can have a short message in PRP IN a billboard or " For Sale " sign does ( " $ 1000 call 555-1212 " ) . Or a sign can mean something as limited as a signal light to indicate your engine is malfunctioning or IN DT day is over IN a sunset does . Which NN is DT Bible intending ? Let 's clear up DT confusion on DT right definition of DT English word " sign " to use : • Prophecy Theorists : Sign = " communication or message from God " much IN a " billboard " or " God 's day timer " ( to borrow from DT title of Mark Biltz 's book where he teaches watching for heavenly signs on God 's calendar among other things ) . • DT Bible : Sign = " wonder , display , token , signal " again , much IN a sunset or a car 's dashboard engine warning light . Here 's what DT problem is with prophecy theorists ' portrayal of celestial " signs " with their limited and specific meanings in their context : PRP 's UH when our car 's designated engine warning light goes off and PRP decide PRP means PRP need to call our mom because she misses PRP . In other words , PRP reject DT simple , limited , contextual meaning of DT sign and expand PRP to be not just something else from left field , but a complete communication IN " Aww ... Mom misses me . I need to call her . " Meanwhile , all DT engine light indicates is something quite vague and limited : something is wrong with DT engine ! DT final nail in DT coffin of DT approach of DT prophecy theorists is IN as PRP VBP about inventing JJ end NN signs based on NASA charts and historical factoids , PRP completely ignore DT CD precursor end NN sign WDT Jesus gave PRP . DT sign is found hidden away in a single , puzzling verse in DT middle of DT Olivet Discourse : " This " gospel of DT Kingdom ? " Which NN was DT again ? " Exactly ! Until 2016 I did not VB DT answer to DT , either . PRP had me stumped , too . PRP 's not our fault . Christianity does not teach any such " this gospel of DT Kingdom " or PRP MD not respond with blank stares when asking what PRP is . Christianity certainly teaches " good NN about Jesus " just not DT good NN of Jesus , PRP VBP , DT NN WDT he taught on DT rewards God gives NNS now who seek DT coming Kingdom and God 's righteousness ( Mt 6:33 ) . VBG further , if Christianity did teach DT Good NNP of Jesus already , Jesus MD not indicate PRP as an end NN sign . PRP 'd somehow have to VB exactly when PRP reaches " all nations , " which PRP can never VB for sure or easily . But if DT Good NN message of DT Kingdom died out with Jesus and DT apostles , then when PRP reappears on DT NNP in our NN , PRP then have a distinct clear and recognizable , unprecedented - in - 2000 - NNS sign . PRP will be so amazing IN DT worldwide spread of PRP in this social NN / YouTube age is ensured . PRP wo n't be able to miss PRP . If PRP VBP to understand this important topic fully now , see DT NN in my supporters section . Finally , Here 's DT Real Role of Eclipses In End NN Prophecy ! By DT way , DT Good NNP of DT Kingdom message will contain a built - in extra reason to " obey PRP " ( 2Th 1:8 ) . I 'm referring to DT warning on end NN events . In our NN , PRP do n't just need to repent to be saved , but RB to follow God 's end NN escape instructions to survive what 's coming . Here 's DT kicker . text: • Stephen Curry raised eyebrows this week when he VBD on a podcast IN he did n't believe in DT moon landing . • ESPN's Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon , hosts of " Pardon DT Interruption , " criticized Curry and some fellow ESPN co-workers who sided with Curry . ESPN's " Pardon DT Interruption " hosts Michael Wilbon and Tony Kornheiser blasted Stephen Curry and some of their fellow co-workers over Curry 's recent comments about DT moon - landing . On Monday , Curry VBD on DT Ringer 's " Winging NNP " podcast IN he does n't VB NASA landed on DT moon . Fellow NBA players Andre Iguodala , Vince Carter , and Kent Bazemore , who were RB featured on DT podcast , agreed . Though Curry did n't elaborate much further , DT comments made DT rounds , with NASA eventually inviting Curry to their facilities to see moon rocks . On Tuesday 's " Pardon DT Interruption , " Wilbon criticized Curry , as well as DT ESPN analyst Jalen Rose and DT NBA reporter Marc J. Spears — both of whom apparently agreed with Curry — saying DT comments are harmful and can lead to NNS questioning history . " Do n't do this . PRP do n't believe in DT Revolutionary War ? ... Do n't do this . PRP guys are too smart . PRP 's not a position to take . " PRP remains unclear if Curry was joking or not . Irving later rescinded his comments and apologized .

This discovery , believed by some to be a joke or a NN theory , has been circulating on social NN in recent weeks after being formulated on Reddit in early 2017 . Except PRP turns out not to be DT only theory of its kind : through DT NNS , online sleuths have found IN all sorts of places do n’t exist .
